[03] 308^b^.^eb^ ^b^sarāmahaṃ bho^eb^ti tadā kira manussānaṃ saccavādikālo hoti, tasmā ``kadā mayā vuttaṃ, kena diṭṭhaṃ, kena suta''nti abhūtaṃ avatvā ``sarāmahaṃ bho''ti āha. ^b^sammodanīyaṃ katha^eb^nti kiṃ mahārāja devattaṃ gate raññe mā cintayittha, dhuvadhammo esa sabbasattānaṃ, evaṃbhāvino saṅkhārāti evarūpaṃ paṭisanthārakathaṃ. ^b^sabbāni sakaṭamukhāni paṭṭhapesī^eb^ti sabbāni cha ^a^M2.0255^ea^ rajjāni sakaṭamukhāni paṭṭhapesi. ekekassa rañño rajjaṃ tiyojanasataṃ hoti, reṇussa rañño rajjosaraṇapadeso dasagāvutaṃ, majjhe pana reṇussa rajjaṃ vitānasadisaṃ ahosi. kasmā evaṃ paṭṭhapesīti? kālena kālaṃ rājānaṃ passituṃ āgacchantā aññassa rajjaṃ apīḷetvā attano attano rajjapadeseneva āgamissanti ceva gamissanti ca. pararajjaṃ otiṇṇassa hi -- ``bhattaṃ detha, goṇaṃ dethā''ti vadato manussā ujjhāyanti -- ``ime rājāno attano attano vijitena na gacchanti, amhākaṃ pīḷaṃ ^a^P2.0662^ea^ karontī''ti. attano vijitena gacchantassa ``amhākaṃ santikā iminā idañcidañca laddhabbamevā''ti manussā pīḷaṃ na maññanti. imamatthaṃ cintayitvā mahāgovindo ``sammodamānā rājāno ciraṃ rajjamanusāsantū''ti evaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
[21] ``dantapuraṃ kaliṅgānaṃ, assakānañca potanaṃ.
[27] māhissati avantīnaṃ, sovīrānañca rodukaṃ..
[26] mithilā ca videhānaṃ, campā aṅgesu māpitā.
[22] bārāṇasī ca kāsīnaṃ, ete govindamāpitā''ti.. --
[03] etāni ^a^V2.0229^ea^ satta nagarāni mahāgovindeneva tesaṃ rājūnaṃ atthāya māpitāni.
[21] ``sattabhū brahmadatto ca, vessabhū bharato saha.
[22] reṇu dve ca dhataraṭṭhā, tadāsuṃ satta bhāradhā''ti.. --

[03] imāni tesaṃ sattannampi nāmāni. tesu hi eko sattabhū nāma ahosi, eko brahmadatto nāma, eko vessabhū nāma, eko teneva saha bharato nāma, eko reṇu nāma, dve pana dhataraṭṭhāti ime satta jambudīpatale bhāradhā mahārājāno ahesunti.
[06] paṭhamabhāṇavāravaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 311^b^.^eb^ ^b^upasaṅkamiṃsū^eb^ti ^a^M2.0256^ea^ ``amhākaṃ ayaṃ issariyasampatti na aññassānubhāvena, mahāgovindassānubhāvena nipphannā. mahāgovindo amhe satta rājāno samagge katvā jambudīpatale patiṭṭhāpesi, pubbūpakārissa pana na sukarā paṭikiriyā kātuṃ. amhe sattapi jane esoyeva anusāsatu, etaṃyeva senāpatiñca purohitañca karoma, evaṃ no vuddhi bhavissatī''ti cintetvā upasaṅkamiṃsu. mahāgovindopi -- ``mayā ete samaggā katā, sace etesaṃ añño senāpati purohito ca bhavissati, tato attano attano senāpatipurohitānaṃ vacanaṃ gahetvā aññamaññaṃ bhindissanti, adhivāsemi nesaṃ senāpatiṭṭhānañca purohitaṭṭhānañcā''ti cintetvā ``evaṃ bho''ti paccassosi.

[03] ^b^satta ca brāhmaṇamahāsāle^eb^ti ``ahaṃ sabbaṭṭhānesu sammukho bhaveyyaṃ vā na vā, yatthāhaṃ sammukho na bhavissāmi, tattheva te kattabbaṃ karissantī''ti satta ^a^P2.0663^ea^ anupurohite ṭhapesi. te sandhāya idaṃ vuttaṃ -- ``satta ca brāhmaṇamahāsāle''ti. divasassa dvikkhattuṃ vā sāyaṃ pāto vā nahāyantīti ^b^nahātakā.^eb^ vatacariyapariyosāne vā nahātā, tato paṭṭhāya brāhmaṇehi saddhiṃ na khādanti na pivantīti nahātakā.

[03] 312^b^.^eb^ ^b^abbhuggacchī^eb^ti ^a^V2.0230^ea^ abhiuggacchi. tadā kira manussānaṃ ``na brahmunā saddhiṃ amantetvā sakkā evaṃ sakalajambudīpaṃ anusāsitu''nti nisinnanisinnaṭṭhāne ayameva kathā pavattittha. ^b^na kho panāha^eb^nti mahāpuriso kira -- ``ayaṃ mayhaṃ abhūto vaṇṇo uppanno, vaṇṇuppatti kho pana na bhāriyā, uppannassa vaṇṇassa rakkhanameva bhāriyaṃ, ayañca me acintetvā amantetvā karontasseva vaṇṇo uppannova, cintetvā mantetvā karontassa pana vitthārikataro bhavissatī''ti brahmadassane upāyaṃ pariyesanto taṃ disvā ^b^sutaṃ kho pana meta^eb^ntiādiatthaṃ parivitakkesi.

[03] 313^b^.^eb^ ^b^yena^eb^ ^a^M2.0257^ea^ ^b^reṇu rājā tenupasaṅkamī^eb^ti evaṃ me antarā daṭṭhukāmo vā sallapitukāmo vā na bhavissati, yato chinnapalibodho sukhaṃ viharissāmīti palibodhupacchedanatthaṃ upasaṅkami, esa nayo sabbattha.
[03] 316^b^.^eb^ ^b^sādisiyo^eb^ti samavaṇṇā samajātikā.

[03] 317^b^.^eb^ ^b^navaṃ sandhāgāraṃ kāretvā^eb^ti rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānacaṅkamanasampannaṃ vassike cattāro māse vasanakkhamaṃ bahi naḷaparikkhittaṃ vicittaṃ āvasathaṃ kāretvā. ^b^karuṇaṃ jhānaṃ jhāyī^eb^ti karuṇāya tikacatukkajjhānaṃ jhāyi, karuṇāmukhena panettha avasesāpi tayo brahmavihārā gahitāva. ^b^ukkaṇṭhanā paritassanā^eb^ti jhānabhūmiyaṃ ṭhitassa anabhiratiukkaṇṭhanā vā bhayaparitassanā vā natthi, brahmuno pana āgamanapatthanā āgamanataṇhā ahūti attho.

[03] 318^b^.^eb^ ^b^bhaya^eb^nti cittutrāsabhayameva. ^b^ajānantā^eb^ti ajānamānā. ^b^kathaṃ jānemu taṃ maya^eb^nti (dī0 ni0 2.179) mayaṃ kinti taṃ jānāma, ayaṃ katthavāsiko, kinnāmo, kiṃ gottotiādīnaṃ ākārānaṃ kena ākārena taṃ dhārayāmāti attho.

[03] ^b^maṃ ve kumāraṃ jānantī^eb^ti maṃ ``kumāro''ti ``daharo''ti jānanti. ^b^brahmaloke^eb^ti seṭṭhaloke. ^b^sanantana^eb^nti ciratanaṃ porāṇakaṃ ^a^P2.0664^ea^. ahaṃ so porāṇakumāro sanaṅkumāro nāma brahmāti dasseti. ^b^evaṃ govinda jānāhī^eb^ti govinda paṇḍita, tvaṃ evaṃ jānāhi, evaṃ maṃ dhārehi.
[21] ``āsanaṃ ^a^V2.0231^ea^ udakaṃ pajjaṃ, madhusākañca brahmuno.
[22] agghe bhavantaṃ pucchāma, agghaṃ kurutu no bhava''nti.. --

[03] ettha ^b^aggha^eb^nti atithino upanāmetabbaṃ vuccati. teneva idamāsanaṃ paññattaṃ, ettha nisīdatha, idaṃ udakaṃ parisuddhaṃ, ito pānīyaṃ pivatha, pāde dhovatha, idaṃ pajjaṃ pādānaṃ hitatthāya abhisaṅkhataṃ telaṃ, ito pāde makkhetha, idaṃ madhusākanti. bodhisattassa brahmacariyaṃ na aññesaṃ brahmacariyasadisaṃ hoti, na so ``idaṃ sve, idaṃ tatiyadivase bhavissatī''ti sannidhiṃ ^a^M2.0258^ea^ nāma karoti. madhusākaṃ pana aloṇaṃ adhūpanaṃ atakkaṃ udakena seditasākaṃ, taṃ sandhāyesa -- ``idaṃ paribhuñjathā''ti vadanto ``agghe bhavantaṃ pucchāmā''tiādimāha. ime sabbepi agghā brahmuno atthi. te ^b^agghe bhavantaṃ pucchāma.^eb^ evaṃ pucchantānañca ^b^agghaṃ kurutu no bhavaṃ,^eb^ paṭiggaṇhātu no bhavaṃ idamagghanti vuttaṃ hoti. kiṃ panesa -- ``ito ekampi brahmā na bhuñjatī''ti idaṃ na jānātīti. no na jānāti, jānantopi attano santike āgato atithi pucchitabboti vattasīsena pucchati.

[03] atha kho brahmā -- ``kiṃ nu kho paṇḍito mama paribhogakaraṇābhāvaṃ ñatvā pucchati, udāhu kohaññe ṭhatvā pucchatī''ti samannāharanto ``vattasīse ṭhito pucchatī''ti ñatvā paṭiggaṇhituṃ dāni me vaṭṭatīti ^b^paṭiggaṇhāma te agghaṃ, yaṃ tvaṃ govinda bhāsasī^eb^ti āha. yaṃ tvaṃ govinda bhāsasi -- ``idamāsanaṃ paññattaṃ, ettha nisīdathā''tiādi, tatra te mayaṃ āsane nisinnā nāma homa, pānīyaṃ pītā nāma homa, pādāpi me dhotā nāma hontu, telenapi makkhitā nāma hontu, udakasākampi paribhuttaṃ nāma hotu, tayā dinnaṃ adhivāsitakālato paṭṭhāya yaṃ yaṃ tvaṃ bhāsasi, taṃ taṃ mayā paṭiggahitameva hoti. tena vuttaṃ -- ``paṭiggaṇhāma te agghaṃ, yaṃ tvaṃ govinda bhāsasī''ti. evaṃ pana agghaṃ paṭiggaṇhitvā pañhassa okāsaṃ karonto ^b^diṭṭhadhammahitatthāyā^eb^tiādimāha.
[03] ^b^kaṅkhī^eb^ ^a^P2.0665^ea^ ^b^akaṅkhiṃ paravediyesū^eb^ti ahaṃ savicikiccho bhavantaṃ parena sayaṃ abhisaṅkhatattā parassa pākaṭesu paravediyesu pañhesu nibbicikicchaṃ.

[03] ^b^hitvā mamatta^eb^nti idaṃ mama, idaṃ mamāti upakaraṇataṇhaṃ cajitvā. ^b^manujesū^eb^ti sattesu, manujesu yo koci manujo mamattaṃ hitvāti attho. ^b^ekodibhūto^eb^ti ekībhūto, eko tiṭṭhanto eko nisīdantoti. vacanattho panettha eko udeti pavattatīti ekodi, tādiso bhūtoti ekodibhūto ^a^V2.0232^ea^. ^b^karuṇedhimutto^eb^ti karuṇājhāne adhimutto, taṃ jhānaṃ nibbattetvāti attho. ^b^nirāmagandho^eb^ti vissagandhavirahito. ^b^ettha ṭhito^eb^ti etesu dhammesu ṭhito. ^b^ettha ca sikkhamāno^eb^ti ^a^M2.0259^ea^ etesu dhammesu sikkhamāno. ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana upari mahāgovindena ca brahmunā ca vuttoyeva.

[03] 320^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^ete avidvā^eb^ti ete āmagandhe ahaṃ avidvā, na jānāmīti attho. ^b^idha brūhi dhīrā^eb^ti te me tvaṃ idha dhīra paṇḍita, brūhi, vada. ^b^kenāvaṭā vāti pajā kurutū^eb^ti katamena kilesāvaraṇena āvaritā pajā pūtikā vāyati. ^b^āpāyikā^eb^ti apāyūpagā. ^b^nivutabrahmalokā^eb^ti nivuto pihito brahmaloko assāti nivutabrahmaloko. katamena kilesena pajāya brahmalokūpago maggo nivuto pihito paṭicchannoti pucchati.

[03] ^b^kodho mosavajjaṃ nikati ca dubbho^eb^ti kujjhanalakkhaṇo kodho ca, paravisaṃvādanalakkhaṇo musāvādo ca, sadisaṃ dassetvā vañcanalakkhaṇā nikati ca, mittadubbhanalakkhaṇo dubbho ca. ^b^kadariyatā atimāno usūyā^eb^ti thaddhamacchariyalakkhaṇā kadariyatā ca, atikkamitvā maññanalakkhaṇo atimāno ca, parasampattikhīyanalakkhaṇā ^b^usūyā ca. icchā vivicchā paraheṭhanā cā^eb^ti taṇhālakkhaṇā icchā ca, macchariyalakkhaṇā vivicchā ca, vihiṃsālakkhaṇā paraheṭhanā ca. ^b^lobho ca doso ca mado ca moho^eb^ti yattha katthaci lubbhanalakkhaṇo lobho ca, dussanalakkhaṇo doso ca, majjanalakkhaṇo mado ca, muyhanalakkhaṇo moho ca. ^b^etesu yuttā anirāmagandhā^eb^ti etesu cuddasasu kilesesu yuttā pajā nirāmagandhā na hoti, āmagandhā sakuṇapagandhā ^a^P2.0666^ea^ pūtigandhāyevāti vadati. ^b^āpāyikā nivutabrahmalokā^eb^ti esā pana āpāyikā ceva hoti, paṭicchannabrahmalokamaggā cāti. idaṃ pana suttaṃ kathentena ^b^āmagandhasuttena^eb^ dīpetvā kathetabbaṃ, āmagandhasuttampi iminā dīpetvā kathetabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^te na sunimmadayā^eb^ti te āmagandhā sunimmadayā sukhena nimmadetabbā pahātabbā na honti, duppajahā dujjayāti attho. ^b^yassa dāni bhavaṃ govindo kālaṃ maññatī^eb^ti ``yassā pabbajjāya bhavaṃ govindo kālaṃ maññati, ayameva hotu, evaṃ sati mayhampi tava santike āgamanaṃ svāgamanaṃ bhavissati, kathitadhammakathā sukathitā bhavissati, tvaṃ tāta sakalajambudīpe ^a^M2.0260^ea^ aggapuriso daharo paṭhamavaye ṭhito, evaṃ mahantaṃ nāma sampattisirivilāsaṃ pahāya tava pabbajanaṃ nāma gandhahatthino ayabandhanaṃ chinditvā gamanaṃ viya atiuḷāraṃ, buddhatanti nāmesā''ti mahāpurisassa daḷhīkammaṃ katvā brahmā sanaṅkumāro brahmalokameva gato.

[03] 321^b^.^eb^ mahāpurisopi ^a^V2.0233^ea^ ``mama itova nikkhamitvā pabbajanaṃ nāma na yuttaṃ, ahaṃ rājakulassa atthaṃ anusāsāmi, tasmā rañño ārocessāmi. sace sopi pabbajissati, sundarameva. no ce pabbajissati, purohitaṭṭhānaṃ niyyātetvā ahaṃ pabbajissāmī''ti cintetvā rājānaṃ upasaṅkami, tena vuttaṃ -- ``atha kho bho mahāgovindo,...pe0... nāhaṃ porohacce rame''ti.
[03] tattha ^b^tvaṃ pajānassu rajjenā^eb^ti tava rajjena tvameva jānāhi. ^b^nāhaṃ porohicce rame^eb^ti ahaṃ purohitabhāve na ramāmi, ukkaṇṭhitosmi, aññaṃ anusāsakaṃ jānāhi, nāhaṃ porohicce rameti.

[03] atha rājā -- ``dhuvaṃ cattāro māse paṭisallīnassa brāhmaṇassa gehe bhogā mandā jātā''ti cintetvā dhanena nimantento -- ``sace te ūnaṃ kāmehi. ahaṃ paripūrayāmi te''ti vatvā puna -- ``kinnu kho esa ekako viharanto kenaci vihiṃsito bhaveyyā''ti cintetvā,
[21] ``yo taṃ hiṃsati vāremi, bhūmisenāpati ahaṃ.
[22] tuvaṃ pitā ahaṃ putto, mā no govinda pājahī''ti.. --

[03] āha ^a^P2.0667^ea^. tassattho -- yo taṃ hiṃsati, taṃ vāremi, kevalaṃ tumhe ``asuko''ti ācikkhatha, ahamettha kattabbaṃ jānissāmīti. ^b^bhūmisenāpati aha^eb^nti atha vā ahaṃ pathaviyā sāmī, svāhaṃ imaṃ rajjaṃ tumheyeva paṭicchāpessāmi. ^b^tuvaṃ pitā ahaṃ putto^eb^ti tvaṃ pitiṭṭhāne ṭhassasi, ahaṃ puttaṭṭhāne. so tvaṃ mama manaṃ haritvā attanoyeva manaṃ govinda, pājehi; yathā icchasi tathā pavattassu. ahaṃ pana tava manaṃyeva anuvattanto tayā dinnapiṇḍaṃ paribhuñjanto taṃ asicammahattho vā upaṭṭhahissāmi, rathaṃ vā te pājessāmi. ``mā no govinda, pajahī''ti vā pāṭho ^a^M2.0261^ea^. tassattho -- tvaṃ pitiṭṭhāne tiṭṭha, ahaṃ puttaṭṭhāne ṭhassāmi. mā no tvaṃ bho govinda, pajahi, mā pariccajīti. atha mahāpuriso yaṃ rājā cintesi, tassa attani abhāvaṃ dassento --
[21] ``na ^a^V2.0234^ea^ matthi ūnaṃ kāmehi, hiṃsitā me na vijjati.
[22] amanussavaco sutvā, tasmāhaṃ na gahe rame''ti.. --
[03] āha. tattha ^b^na matthī^eb^ti na me atthi. ^b^gahe^eb^ti gehe. atha naṃ rājā pucchi --
[21] ``amanusso kathaṃ vaṇṇo, kiṃ te atthaṃ abhāsatha.
[22] yañca sutvā jahāsi no, gehe amhe ca kevalī''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^jahāsi no, gehe amhe ca kevalī^eb^ti brāhmaṇassa sampattibharite gehe saṅgahavasena attano gehe karonto yaṃ sutvā amhākaṃ gehe ca amhe ca kevalī sabbe aparisese jambudīpavāsino jahāsīti vadati.

[03] athassa ācikkhanto mahāpuriso ^b^upavutthassa me pubbe^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^upavutthassā^eb^ti cattāro māse ekībhāvaṃ upagantvā vutthassa. ^b^yiṭṭhakāmassa me sato^eb^ti yajitukāmassa me ^a^P2.0668^ea^ samānassa. ^b^aggi pajjalito āsi, kusapattaparitthato^eb^ti kusapattehi paritthato sappidadhimadhuādīni pakkhipitvā aggi jalayitumāraddho āsi, evaṃ aggiṃ jāletvā ``mahājanassa dānaṃ dassāmī''ti evaṃ cintetvā ṭhitassa mamāti ayamettha attho.

[03] ^b^sanantano^eb^ti sanaṅkumāro brahmā. tato rājā sayampi pabbajitukāmo hutvā ^b^saddahāmī^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^kathaṃ vattetha aññathā^eb^ti kathaṃ tumhe aññathā vattissatha. ^b^te taṃ anuvattissāmā^eb^ti te mayampi tumheyeva anuvattissāma, anupabbajissāmāti attho. ``anuvajissāmā''tipi pāṭho, tassa anugacchissāmāti attho. ^b^akāco^eb^ti nikkāco akakkaso. ^b^govindassānusāsane^eb^ti tava govindassa sāsane. bhavantaṃ govindameva satthāraṃ karitvā carissāmāti vadati.

[03] 322^b^.^eb^ ^b^yena^eb^ ^a^M2.0262^ea^ ^b^te cha khattiyā tenupasaṅkamī^eb^ti reṇuṃ rājānaṃ ``sādhu mahārāja rajjaṃ nāma mātaraṃ pitaraṃ bhātibhaginīādayopi māretvā gaṇhantesu sattesu evaṃ mahantaṃ rajjasiriṃ pahāya pabbajitukāmena uḷāraṃ mahārājena kata''nti upatthambhetvā daḷhataramassa ussāhaṃ katvā upasaṅkami ^a^V2.0235^ea^. ^b^evaṃ samacintesu^eb^nti rañño cintitanayeneva kadāci brāhmaṇassa bhogā parihīnā bhaveyyunti maññamānā samacintesuṃ. ^b^dhanena sikkheyyāmā^eb^ti upalāpeyyāma saṅgaṇheyyāma. ^b^tāvatakaṃ āharīyata^eb^nti tāvatakaṃ āharāpiyatu gaṇhiyatu, yattakaṃ icchatha, tattakaṃ gaṇhathāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^bhavantānaṃyeva vāhasā^eb^ti bhavante paccayaṃ katvā, tumhehi dinnattāyeva pahūtaṃ sāpateyyaṃ jātaṃ.

[03] 323^b^.^eb^ ^b^sace jahatha kāmānī^eb^ti sace vatthukāme ca kilesakāme ca pariccajatha. ^b^yattha satto puthujjano^eb^ti yesu kāmesu puthujjano satto laggo laggito. ^b^ārambhavho daḷhā hothā^eb^ti evaṃ sante vīriyaṃ ārabhatha, asithilaparakkamataṃ adhiṭṭhāya daḷhā bhavatha. ^b^khantībalasamāhitā^eb^ti khantibalena samannāgatā bhavathāti rājūnaṃ ussāhaṃ janeti.

[03] ^b^esa maggo ujumaggo^eb^ti esa karuṇājhānamaggo ujumaggo nāma. ^b^esa maggo anuttaro^eb^ti eseva ^a^P2.0669^ea^ brahmalokūpapattiyā asadisamaggo uttamamaggo nāma. ^b^saddhammo sabbhi rakkhito^eb^ti eso eva ca buddhapaccekabuddhasāvakehi sabbhirakkhitadhammo nāma. iti karuṇājhānassa vaṇṇabhaṇanenāpi tesaṃ anivattanatthāya daḷhīkammameva karoti.

[03] ^b^ko nu kho pana bho jānāti jīvitāna^eb^nti bho jīvitaṃ nāma udakapupphuḷūpamaṃ tiṇagge ussāvabindūpamaṃ taṅkhaṇaviddhaṃsanadhammaṃ, tassa ko gatiṃ jānāti, kismiṃ khaṇe bhijjissati? ^b^gamanīyo samparāyo^eb^ti paraloko pana avassaṃ gantabbova, tattha paṇḍitena kulaputtena ^b^mantāyaṃ boddhabbaṃ.^eb^ mantā vuccati paññā, tāya mantetabbaṃ bujjhitabbaṃ, upaparikkhitabbañca jānitabbañcāti attho. karaṇatthe vā bhummaṃ. ^b^mantāyaṃ boddhabba^eb^nti mantāya bujjhitabbaṃ, ñāṇena jānitabbanti attho. kiṃ bujjhitabbaṃ? jīvitassa dujjānatā, samparāyassa ^a^M2.0263^ea^ ca avassaṃ gamanīyatā, bujjhitvā ca pana sabbapalibodhe chinditvā ^b^kattabbaṃ kusalaṃ caritabbaṃ brahmacariyaṃ.^eb^ kasmā? yasmā natthi jātassa amaraṇaṃ.

[03] 324^b^.^eb^ ^b^appesakkhā ca appalābhā cā^eb^ti bho pabbajjā nāma appayasā ceva, pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya hi rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajitaṃ viheṭhetvā viheṭhetvā lāmakaṃ anāthaṃ katvāva kathenti. appalābhā ca, sakalagāmaṃ caritvāpi ajjhoharaṇīyaṃ dullabhameva. idaṃ pana ^b^brahmaññaṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0236^ea^ ^b^mahesakkhañca^eb^ mahāyasattā, ^b^mahālābhañca^eb^ lābhasakkārasampannattā. bhavañhi etarahi sakalajambudīpe aggapurohito sabbattha aggāsanaṃ aggodakaṃ aggabhattaṃ aggagandhaṃ aggamālaṃ labhatīti.

[03] ^b^rājāva rañña^eb^nti ahañhi bho etarahi pakatiraññaṃ majjhe cakkavattirājā viya. ^b^brahmāva brahmāna^eb^nti pakatibrahmānaṃ majjhe mahābrahmasadiso. ^b^devatāva gahapatikāna^eb^nti avasesagahapatikānaṃ panamhi sakkadevarājasadiso.
[03] 325^b^.^eb^ ^b^cattārīsā bhariyā sādisiyo^eb^ti sādisiyova cattārīsā bhariyā, aññā panassa tīsu vayesu nāṭakitthiyo bahukāyeva.

[03] 326^b^.^eb^ ^b^cārikaṃ caratī^eb^ti gāmanigamapaṭipāṭiyā cārikaṃ carati, gatagataṭṭhāne ^a^P2.0670^ea^ ^b^buddhakolāhalaṃ^eb^ viya hoti. manussā ``mahāgovindapaṇḍito kira āgacchatī''ti sutvā puretarameva maṇḍapaṃ kāretvā maggaṃ alaṅkaritvā paccuggantvā gaṇhitvā enti, mahālābhasakkāro mahogho viya ajjhottharanto uppajji. ^b^sattapurohitassā^eb^ti sattannaṃ rājūnaṃ purohitassa. iti yathā etarahi evarūpesu vā ṭhānesu kismiñcideva dukkhe uppanne ``namo buddhassā''ti vadanti, evaṃ tadā ``namatthu mahāgovindassa brāhmaṇassa, namatthu sattapurohitassā''ti vadanti.

[03] 327^b^.^eb^ ^b^mettāsahagatenā^eb^tiādinā ^a^M2.0264^ea^ nayena pāḷiyaṃ brahmavihārāva āgatā, mahāpuriso pana sabbāpi aṭṭha samāpattiyo ca pañca ca abhiññāyo nibbattesi. ^b^sāvakānañca brahmalokasahabyatāya maggaṃ desesī^eb^ti brahmaloke brahmunā sahabhāvāya maggaṃ kathesi.

[03] 328^b^.^eb^ ^b^sabbenasabba^eb^nti ye aṭṭha ca samāpattiyo pañca ca abhiññāyo nibbattesuṃ. ^b^ye na sabbena sabbaṃ sāsanaṃ ājāniṃsū^eb^ti ye aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu ekasamāpattimpi na jāniṃsu, na sakkhiṃsu nibbattetuṃ. ^b^amoghā^eb^ti savipākā. ^b^avañjhā^eb^ti na vañjhā. sabbanihīnaṃ pasavanti gandhabbakāyaṃ ^a^V2.0237^ea^ pasavi. ^b^saphalā^eb^ti avasesadevalokūpapattīhi sātthā. ^b^saudrayā^eb^ti brahmalokūpapattiyā savuḍḍhi.

[03] 329^b^.^eb^ ^b^sarāmaha^eb^nti sarāmi ahaṃ pañcasikha, iminā kira padena ayaṃ suttanto buddhabhāsito nāma jāto. ^b^na nibbidāyā^eb^ti na vaṭṭe nibbindanatthāya. ^b^na virāgāyā^eb^ti na vaṭṭe virāgatthāya. ^b^na nirodhāyā^eb^ti na vaṭṭassa nirodhatthāya. ^b^na upasamāyā^eb^ti na vaṭṭassa upasamanatthāya. ^b^na abhiññāyā^eb^ti na vaṭṭaṃ abhijānanatthāya. ^b^na sambodhāyā^eb^ti na kilesaniddāvigamena vaṭṭato pabujjhanatthāya. ^b^na nibbānāyā^eb^ti na amatanibbānatthāya.

[03] ^b^ekantanibbidāyā^eb^ti ekantameva vaṭṭe nibbindanatthāya. ettha pana ^b^nibbidāyā^eb^ti vipassanā. ^b^virāgāyā^eb^ti maggo. ^b^nirodhāya upasamāyā^eb^ti nibbānaṃ. ^b^abhiññāya sambodhāyā^eb^ti maggo. ^b^nibbānāyā^eb^ti nibbānameva. evaṃ ekasmiṃ ṭhāne vipassanā, tīsu maggo, tīsu nibbānaṃ vuttanti evaṃ vavatthānakathā veditabbā. pariyāyena pana sabbānipetāni ^a^P2.0671^ea^ maggavevacanānipi nibbānavevacanānipi hontiyeva. ^b^sammādiṭṭhi^eb^ādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ visuddhimagge saccavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttameva.

[03] 330^b^.^eb^ ^b^ye na sabbenasabba^eb^nti ye cattāropi ariyamagge paripūretuṃ na jānanti, tīṇi vā dve vā ekaṃ vā nibbattenti. ^b^sabbesaṃyeva imesaṃ kulaputtāna^eb^nti brahmacariyaciṇṇakulaputtānaṃ. ^b^amoghā...pe0... saphalā saudrayā^eb^ti arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.

[03] ^b^bhagavantaṃ^eb^ ^a^M2.0265^ea^ ^b^abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā^eb^ti (dī0 ni0 2.188) bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ cittena sampaṭicchanto abhinanditvā vācāya pasaṃsamāno anumoditvā mahantaṃ añjaliṃ sirasmiṃ patiṭṭhapetvā pasannalākhārase nimujjamāno viya dasabalassa chabbaṇṇarasmijālantaraṃ pavisitvā catūsu ṭhānesu vanditvā tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā bhagavantaṃ abhitthavanto abhitthavanto satthu purato antaradhāyitvā attano devalokameva agamāsīti.
[06] iti sumaṅgalavilāsiniyā dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
[06] mahāgovindasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 331^b^.^eb^ ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0238^ea^ ^a^P2.0672^ea^ ^a^M2.0266^ea^ ^b^me suta^eb^nti mahāsamayasuttaṃ. tatrāyamapubbapadavaṇṇanā -- ^b^sakkesū^eb^ti ambaṭṭhasutte vuttena uppattinayena ``sakyā vata, bho kumārā''ti udānaṃ paṭicca ^b^sakkā^eb^ti laddhanāmānaṃ rājakumārānaṃ nivāso ekopi janapado ruḷhīsaddena ``sakkā''ti vuccati, tasmiṃ sakkesu janapade. ^b^mahāvane^eb^ti sayaṃjāte aropite himavantena saddhiṃ ekābaddhe mahati vane. ^b^sabbeheva arahantehī^eb^ti imaṃ suttaṃ kathitadivaseyeva pattārahattehi.

[03] tatrāyaṃ anupubbikathā -- sākiyakoliyā kira kapilavatthunagarassa ca koliyanagarassa ca antare rohiṇiṃ nāma nadiṃ ekeneva āvaraṇena bandhāpetvā sassāni karonti, atha jeṭṭhamūlamāse sassesu milāyantesu ubhayanagaravāsikānampi kammakarā sannipatiṃsu. tattha koliyanagaravāsino āhaṃsu -- ``idaṃ udakaṃ ubhato hariyamānaṃ na tumhākaṃ na amhākaṃ pahossati, amhākaṃ pana sassaṃ ekena udakeneva nipphajjissati, idaṃ udakaṃ amhākaṃ dethā''ti. kapilavatthunagaravāsino āhaṃsu -- ``tumhesu koṭṭhe pūretvā ṭhitesu mayaṃ rattasuvaṇṇanīlamaṇikāḷakahāpaṇe ca gahetvā pacchipasibbakādihatthā na sakkhissāma tumhākaṃ gharadvāre vicarituṃ, amhākampi sassaṃ ekeneva udakena nipphajjissati, idaṃ udakaṃ amhākaṃ dethā''ti. ``na ^a^P2.0673^ea^ mayaṃ dassāmā''ti. ``mayampi na dassāmā''ti. evaṃ kalahaṃ vaḍḍhetvā eko uṭṭhāya ekassa pahāraṃ adāsi, sopi aññassāti evaṃ aññamaññaṃ paharitvā rājakulānaṃ jātiṃ ghaṭṭetvā kalahaṃ vaḍḍhayiṃsu.

[03] koliyakammakarā vadanti -- ``tumhe kapilavatthuvāsike gahetvā gajjatha, ye soṇasiṅgālādayo viya attano bhaginīhi saddhiṃ saṃvasiṃsu. etesaṃ hatthino ca assā ca phalakāvudhāni ^a^V2.0239^ea^ ca amhākaṃ kiṃ karissantī''ti? sākiyakammakarāpi vadanti -- ``tumhe dāni kuṭṭhino dārake gahetvā gajjatha, ye anāthā niggatikā tiracchānā viya kolarukkhe vasiṃsu, etesaṃ hatthino ca assā ca phalakāvudhāni ca amhākaṃ ^a^M2.0267^ea^ kiṃ karissantī''ti? te gantvā tasmiṃ kamme niyuttāmaccānaṃ kathesuṃ, amaccā rājakulānaṃ kathesuṃ, tato sākiyā -- ``bhaginīhi saddhiṃ saṃvāsikānaṃ thāmañca balañca dassessāmā''ti yuddhasajjā nikkhamiṃsu. koliyāpi -- ``kolarukkhavāsīnaṃ thāmañca balañca dassessāmā''ti yuddhasajjā nikkhamiṃsu.

[03] bhagavāpi rattiyā paccūsasamayeva mahākaruṇāsamāpattito vuṭṭhāya lokaṃ volokento ime evaṃ yuddhasajje nikkhamante addasa. disvā -- ``mayi gate ayaṃ kalaho vūpasamissati nu kho udāhu no''ti upadhārento -- ``ahamettha gantvā kalahavūpasamanatthaṃ tīṇi jātakāni kathessāmi, tato kalaho vūpasamissati. atha sāmaggidīpanatthāya dve jātakāni kathetvā ^b^attadaṇḍasuttaṃ^eb^ desessāmi. desanaṃ sutvā ubhayanagaravāsinopi aḍḍhatiyāni aḍḍhatiyāni kumārasatāni dassanti, ahaṃ te pabbajissāmi, tadā mahāsamāgamo bhavissatī''ti sanniṭṭhānamakāsi. tasmā imesu yuddhasajjesu nikkhamantesu kassaci anārocetvā sayameva pattacīvaramādāya gantvā dvinnaṃ senānaṃ antare ākāse pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā chabbaṇṇarasmiyo vissajjetvā nisīdi.

[03] kapilavatthuvāsino bhagavantaṃ disvāva -- ``amhākaṃ ñātiseṭṭho satthā āgato, diṭṭho nu kho tena amhākaṃ kalahakāraṇabhāvo''ti cintetvā -- ``na kho pana sakkā bhagavati āgate amhehi parassa sarīre satthaṃ pātetuṃ, koliyanagaravāsino amhe ^a^P2.0674^ea^ hanantu vā pacantu vā''ti āvudhāni chaḍḍetvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā nisīdiṃsu. koliyanagaravāsinopi tatheva cintetvā āvudhāni chaḍḍetvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā nisīdiṃsu.

[03] bhagavā jānantova -- ``kasmā āgatattha mahārājā''ti pucchi. bhagavā, na titthakīḷāya na pabbatakīḷāya na nadīkīḷāya na giridassanatthaṃ, imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne saṅgāmaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā āgatamhāti. kiṃ nissāya vo kalaho mahārājāti? udakaṃ, bhanteti. udakaṃ kiṃ agghati mahārājāti? appagghaṃ, bhanteti. pathavī nāma kiṃ agghati mahārājāti? anagghā, bhanteti. khattiyā kiṃ agghanti mahārājāti? khattiyā nāma anagghā bhanteti. appamūlakaṃ udakaṃ nissāya kimatthaṃ anagghe khattiye nāsetha, mahārājāti? ``kalahe assādo nāma natthi, kalahavasena mahārājā aṭṭhāne veraṃ katvā ekāya rukkhadevatāya kāḷasīhena saddhiṃ baddhāghāto ^a^V2.0240^ea^ sakalampi ^a^M2.0268^ea^ imaṃ kappaṃ anuppattoyevā''ti vatvā ^b^phandanajātakaṃ^eb^ kathesi. tato ``parapattiyena nāma mahārājā na bhavitabbaṃ. parapattiyā hutvā hi ekassa sasakassa kathāya tiyojanasahassavitthate himavante catuppadagaṇā mahāsamuddaṃ pakkhandino ahesuṃ. tasmā parapattiyena na bhavitabba''nti vatvā ^b^pathavīundriyajātakaṃ^eb^ kathesi. tato -- ``kadāci, mahārājā, dubbalopi mahabbalassa randhaṃ vivaraṃ passati, kadāci mahabbalo dubbalassa. laṭukikāpi hi sakuṇikā hatthināgaṃ ghātesī''ti vatvā ^b^laṭukikajātakaṃ^eb^ kathesi. evaṃ kalahavūpasamatthāya tīṇi jātakāni kathetvā sāmaggiparidīpanatthāya dve jātakāni kathesi. kathaṃ? samaggānañhi mahārājā koci otāraṃ nāma passituṃ na sakkotīti vatvā ^b^rukkhadhammajātakaṃ^eb^ kathesi. tato ``samaggānaṃ mahārājā koci vivaraṃ passituṃ nāsakkhi. yadā pana aññamaññaṃ vivādamakaṃsu, atha te nesādaputto jīvitā voropetvā ādāya gato. vivāde assādo nāma natthī''ti vatvā ^b^vaṭṭakajātakaṃ^eb^ kathesi. evaṃ imāni pañca jātakāni kathetvā avasāne attadaṇḍasuttaṃ kathesi.

[03] rājāno ^a^P2.0675^ea^ pasannā -- ``sace satthā nāgamissa, mayaṃ sahatthā aññamaññaṃyeva vadhitvā lohitanadiṃ pavattayissāma, amhākaṃ puttabhātaro gehadvāre na passeyyāma, sāsanapaṭisāsanampi no āharaṇako na bhavissati. satthāraṃ nissāya no jīvitaṃ laddhaṃ. sace pana satthā agāraṃ ajjhāvasissa, dvisahassadīpaparivāresu catūsu mahādīpesu rajjamassa hatthagataṃ abhavissa, atirekasahassaṃ kho panassa puttā abhavissaṃsu, tato khattiyaparivārova avicarissa. taṃ kho panesa sampattiṃ pahāya nikkhamitvā sambodhiṃ patto, idānipi khattiyaparivāroyeva vicaratū''ti ubhayanagaravāsino aḍḍhatiyāni aḍḍhatiyāni kumārasatāni adaṃsu. bhagavā te pabbājetvā mahāvanaṃ agamāsi. tesaṃ garugāravavasena na attano ruciyā pabbajitānaṃ anabhirati uppajji. purāṇadutiyikāyopi nesaṃ ``ayyaputtā ukkaṇṭhantu, gharāvāso na saṇṭhātī''tiādīni vatvā sāsanaṃ pesenti. te atirekataraṃ ukkaṇṭhiṃsu.

[03] bhagavā āvajjanto tesaṃ anabhiratabhāvaṃ ñatvā ``ime bhikkhū mādisena buddhena saddhiṃ ekato vasantā ukkaṇṭhanti, handa nesaṃ kuṇāladahassa vaṇṇaṃ kathetvā tattha netvā anabhiratiṃ vinodessāmī''ti ^a^M2.0269^ea^ kuṇāladahassa vaṇṇaṃ kathesi. te taṃ daṭṭhukāmā ahesuṃ. daṭṭhukāmattha, bhikkhave, kuṇāladahanti? āma bhagavāti. yadi evaṃ, etha, gacchāmāti. iddhimantānaṃ bhagavā gamanaṭṭhānaṃ mayaṃ kathaṃ gamissāmāti? tumhe gantukāmā hotha, ahaṃ mamānubhāvena gahetvā gamissāmīti. sādhu, bhanteti. atha bhagavā pañca bhikkhusatāni gahetvā ākāse uppatitvā ^a^V2.0241^ea^ kuṇāladahe patiṭṭhāya te bhikkhū āha -- ``bhikkhave, imasmiṃ kuṇāladahe yesaṃ macchānaṃ nāmaṃ na jānātha, tesaṃ nāmaṃ pucchathā''ti.

[03] te pucchiṃsu, bhagavā pucchitapucchitaṃ kathesi. na kevalaṃ macchānaṃyeva, tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe rukkhānampi pabbatapāde dvipadacatuppadasakuṇānampi nāmāni pucchāpetvā kathesi. atha dvīhi sakuṇehi mukhatuṇḍakena ḍaṃsitvā gahitadaṇḍake nisinno kuṇālasakuṇarājā purato pacchato ubhosu passesu sakuṇasaṅghaparivuto āgacchati. bhikkhū taṃ disvā -- ``esa, bhante, imesaṃ sakuṇānaṃ rājā bhavissati, parivārā ete etassā''ti ^a^P2.0676^ea^ maññāmāti. evameva, bhikkhave, ayampi mama vaṃso mama paveṇīti. idāni tāva mayaṃ, bhante, ete sakuṇe passāma. yaṃ pana bhagavā ``ayampi mama vaṃso mama paveṇī''ti āha, taṃ sotukāmamhāti. sotukāmattha bhikkhaveti? āma, bhagavāti. tena hi suṇāthāti tīhi gāthāsatehi maṇḍetvā ^b^kuṇālajātakaṃ^eb^ kathento anabhiratiṃ vinodesi. desanāpariyosāne sabbepi sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu, maggeneva ca nesaṃ iddhipi āgatā. bhagavā -- ``hotu tāva ettakaṃ etesaṃ bhikkhūna''nti ākāse uppatitvā mahāvanameva agamāsi. tepi bhikkhū gamanakāle dasabalassa ānubhāvena gantvā āgamanakāle attano ānubhāvena bhagavantaṃ parivāretvā mahāvane otariṃsu.

[03] bhagavā paññattāsane nisīditvā te bhikkhū āmantetvā -- ``etha, bhikkhave, nisīdatha, uparimaggattayavajjhānaṃ vo kilesānaṃ pahānāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathessāmī''ti kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathesi. bhikkhū cintesuṃ -- ``bhagavā amhākaṃ anabhiratabhāvaṃ ñatvā kuṇāladahaṃ netvā anabhiratiṃ vinodesi, tattha sotāpattiphalappattānaṃ no idāni idha tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ adāsi, na kho panamhehi `sotāpannā maya'nti vītināmetuṃ vaṭṭati, uttamapurisasadisehi no bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī''ti te dasabalassa pāde vanditvā uṭṭhāya nisīdanaṃ papphoṭetvā visuṃ visuṃ pabbhārarukkhamūlesu nisīdiṃsu.

[03] bhagavā ^a^M2.0270^ea^ cintesi -- ``ime bhikkhū pakatiyāpi avissaṭṭhakammaṭṭhānā, laddhupāyassa pana bhikkhuno kilamanakāraṇaṃ nāma natthi. gacchantā gacchantā ca vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ patvā -- ``attanā attanā paṭiladdhaguṇaṃ ārocessāmā'ti mama santikaṃ āgamissanti. etesu āgatesu dasasahassacakkavāḷe devatā ekacakkavāḷe sannipatissanti, mahāsamayo bhavissati, vivitte okāse mayā nisīdituṃ vaṭṭatī''ti. tato vivitte okāse buddhāsanaṃ paññapetvā nisīdi.

[03] sabbapaṭhamaṃ ^a^V2.0242^ea^ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā gatathero saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tato aparo tato aparoti pañcasatāpi paduminiyaṃ padumāni viya vikasiṃsu. sabbapaṭhamaṃ ^a^P2.0677^ea^ arahattappattabhikkhu -- ``bhagavato ārocessāmī''ti pallaṅkaṃ vinibbhujitvā nisīdanaṃ papphoṭetvā uṭṭhāya dasabalābhimukho ahosi. evaṃ aparopi aparopīti pañcasatāpi bhattasālaṃ pavisantā viya paṭipāṭiyāva āgamaṃsu. paṭhamaṃ āgato vanditvā nisīdanaṃ paññapetvā ekamantaṃ nisīditvā paṭiladdhaguṇaṃ ārocetukāmo -- ``atthi nu kho añño koci, natthī''ti nivattitvā āgamanamaggaṃ olokento aparampi addasa aparampi addasa. iti sabbepi te āgantvā ekamantaṃ nisīditvā ayaṃ imassa harāyamāno na kathesi, ayaṃ imassa harāyamāno na kathesīti. khīṇāsavānaṃ kira dve ākārā honti -- ``aho vata mayā paṭiladdhaguṇaṃ sadevako loko khippameva paṭivijjheyyā''ti cittaṃ uppajjati. paṭiladdhabhāvaṃ pana nidhiladdhapuriso viya na aññassa ārocetukāmo hoti.

[03] evaṃ osīdamatte pana tasmiṃ ariyamaṇḍale pācīnayugandharaparikkhepato abbhā, mahikā, dhūmo, rajo, rāhūti imehi upakkilesehi vippamuttaṃ buddhuppādapaṭimaṇḍitassa lokassa rāmaṇeyyakadassanatthaṃ pācīnadisāya ukkhittarajatamayamahāādāsamaṇḍalaṃ viya, nemivaṭṭiyaṃ gahetvā parivattiyamānarajatacakkasassirikaṃ puṇṇacandamaṇḍalaṃ ullaṅghitvā anilapathaṃ paṭipajjittha. iti evarūpe khaṇe laye muhutte bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṃ mahāvane mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ pañcamattehi bhikkhusatehi sabbeheva arahantehi.

[03] tattha bhagavāpi mahāsammatassa vaṃse uppanno, tepi pañcasatā bhikkhū mahāsammatassa kule uppannā. bhagavāpi khattiyagabbhe jāto, tepi khattiyagabbhe ^a^M2.0271^ea^ jātā. bhagavāpi rājapabbajito, tepi rājapabbajitā. bhagavāpi setacchattaṃ pahāya hatthagataṃ cakkavattirajjaṃ nissajjetvā pabbajito, tepi setacchattaṃ pahāya hatthagatāni rajjāni nissajjetvā pabbajitā. iti bhagavā parisuddhe okāse parisuddhe rattibhāge sayaṃ parisuddho parisuddhaparivāro vītarāgo vītarāgaparivāro vītadoso vītadosaparivāro vītamoho vītamohaparivāro nittaṇho nittaṇhaparivāro nikkileso nikkilesaparivāro santo santaparivāro danto dantaparivāro mutto muttaparivāro ativiya virocatīti. vaṇṇabhūmi ^a^P2.0678^ea^ nāmesā, yattakaṃ sakkoti, tattakaṃ vattabbaṃ. iti ime bhikkhū sandhāya vuttaṃ -- ``pañcamattehi bhikkhusatehi sabbeheva arahantehī''ti.

[03] ^b^yebhuyyenā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0243^ea^ bahutarā sannipatitā, mandā na sannipatitā asaññā arūpāvacaradevatā samāpannadevatā ca. tatrāyaṃ sannipātakkamo mahāvanassa kira sāmantā devatā caliṃsu -- ``āyāma, bho buddhadassanaṃ nāma bahūpakāraṃ, dhammassavanaṃ bahūpakāraṃ, bhikkhusaṅghadassanaṃ bahūpakāraṃ, āyāma āyāmā''ti mahāsaddaṃ kurumānā āgantvā bhagavantañca taṃmuhuttaṃ arahattappattakhīṇāsave ca vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu. eteneva upāyena tāsaṃ tāsaṃ saddaṃ sutvā saddantarāḍḍhagāvutagāvutāḍḍhayojanayojanādivasena tiyojanasahassavitthate himavante, tikkhattuṃ tesaṭṭhiyā nagarasahassesu, navanavutiyā doṇamukhasatasahassesu, channavutiyā paṭṭanakoṭisatasahassesu, chapaṇṇāsāya ratanākaresūti sakalajambudīpe, pubbavidehe, aparagoyāne, uttarakurumhi, dvīsu parittadīpasahassesūti sakalacakkavāḷe, tato dutiyatatiyacakkavāḷeti evaṃ dasasahassacakkavāḷesu devatā sannipatitāti veditabbā. dasasahassacakkavāḷañhi idha dasalokadhātuyoti adhippetā. tena vuttaṃ -- ``dasahi ca lokadhātūhi devatā yebhuyyena sannipatitā hontī''ti.

[03] evaṃ sannipatitāhi devatāhi sakalacakkavāḷagabbhaṃ yāva brahmalokā sūcighare nirantaraṃ pakkhittasūcīhi viya paripuṇṇaṃ hoti. tatra brahmalokassa evaṃ uccattanaṃ veditabbaṃ. lohapāsāde kira sattakūṭāgārasamo pāsāṇo brahmaloke ṭhatvā adho khitto catūhi ^a^M2.0272^ea^ māsehi pathaviṃ pāpuṇāti. evaṃ mahante okāse yathā heṭṭhā ṭhatvā khittāni pupphāni vā dhūmo vā upari gantuṃ, upari vā ṭhatvā khittasāsapā heṭṭhā otarituṃ antaraṃ na labhanti, evaṃ nirantaraṃ devatā ahesuṃ. yathā kho pana cakkavattirañño nisinnaṭṭhānaṃ asambādhaṃ hoti, āgatāgatā mahesakkhā khattiyā okāsaṃ labhantiyeva, parato parato pana atisambādhaṃ hoti, evameva bhagavato nisinnaṭṭhānaṃ asambādhaṃ, āgatāgatā mahesakkhā devatā ca mahābrahmāno ca okāsaṃ labhantiyeva. apisudaṃ ^a^P2.0679^ea^ bhagavato āsannāsannaṭṭhāne mahāparinibbāne vuttanayeneva vālaggakoṭinitudanamatte padese dasapi vīsampi sabbaparato tiṃsampi devatā sukhume sukhume attabhāve māpetvā aṭṭhaṃsu. saṭṭhi saṭṭhi devatā aṭṭhaṃsu.

[03] ^b^suddhāvāsakāyikāna^eb^nti suddhāvāsavāsīnaṃ. ^b^suddhāvāsā^eb^ nāma suddhānaṃ anāgāmikhīṇāsavānaṃ āvāsā pañca brahmalokā. ^b^etadahosī^eb^ti kasmā ahosi? te kira brahmāno samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā yathāparicchedena vuṭṭhitā brahmabhavanaṃ olokentā pacchābhatte bhattagehaṃ viya suññataṃ addasaṃsu. tato ``kuhiṃ brahmāno gatā''ti āvajjantā mahāsamāgamaṃ ñatvā -- ``ayaṃ samāgamo mahā, mayaṃ ohīnā, ohīnakānaṃ okāso dullabho hoti, tasmā ^a^V2.0244^ea^ gacchantā atucchahatthā hutvā ekekaṃ gāthaṃ abhisaṅkharitvā gacchāma. tāya mahāsamāgame ca attano āgatabhāvaṃ jānāpessāma, dasabalassa ca vaṇṇaṃ bhāsissāmā''ti. iti tesaṃ samāpattito vuṭṭhāya āvajjitattā etadahosi.

[03] 332^b^.^eb^ ^b^bhagavato purato pāturahesu^eb^nti pāḷiyaṃ bhagavato santike abhimukhaṭṭhāneyeva otiṇṇā viya katvā vuttā, na kho panettha evaṃ attho veditabbo. te pana brahmaloke ṭhitāyeva gāthā abhisaṅkharitvā eko puratthimacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ otari, eko dakkhiṇacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ, eko pacchimacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ, eko uttaracakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ otari. tato puratthimacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ otiṇṇabrahmā nīlakasiṇaṃ samāpajjitvā nīlarasmiyo vissajjitvā dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatānaṃ maṇicammaṃ paṭimuñcanto viya attano āgatabhāvaṃ jānāpetvā buddhavīthi ^a^M2.0273^ea^ nāma kenaci ottharituṃ na sakkā, tasmā pahaṭabuddhavīthiyāva āgantvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. ekamantaṃ ṭhito attanā abhisaṅkhataṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi.

[03] dakkhiṇacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ otiṇṇabrahmāpi pītakasiṇaṃ samāpajjitvā pītarasmiyo suvaṇṇapabhaṃ muñcitvā dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatānaṃ suvaṇṇapaṭaṃ pārupento viya attano āgatabhāvaṃ jānāpetvā tatheva aṭṭhāsi. pacchimacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ ^a^P2.0680^ea^ otiṇṇabrahmāpi lohitakasiṇaṃ samāpajjitvā lohitarasmiyo muñcitvā dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatānaṃ rattavarakambalena parikkhipanto viya attano āgatabhāvaṃ jānāpetvā tatheva aṭṭhāsi. uttaracakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ otiṇṇabrahmāpi odātakasiṇaṃ samāpajjitvā odātarasmiyo muñcitvā dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatānaṃ sumanapaṭaṃ pārupanto viya attano āgatabhāvaṃ jānāpetvā tatheva aṭṭhāsi.

[03] pāḷiyaṃ pana ``bhagavato purato pāturahesuṃ. atha kho tā devatā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsū''ti evaṃ ekakkhaṇaṃ viya purato pātubhāvo ca abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ ṭhitabhāvo ca vutto, so iminā anukkamena ahosi, ekato katvā pana dassito. gāthābhāsanaṃ pana pāḷiyaṃ visuṃ visuṃyeva vuttaṃ.

[03] tattha ^b^mahāsamayo^eb^ti mahāsamūho. ^b^pavanaṃ^eb^ vuccati vanasaṇḍo. ubhayenapi bhagavā imasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe ajja mahāsamūho mahāsannipātoti āha. tato yesaṃ so sannipāto, te dassetuṃ ^b^devakāyā^eb^ ^a^V2.0245^ea^ ^b^samāgatā^eb^ti āha. tattha ^b^devakāyā^eb^ti devaghaṭā. ^b^āgatamha imaṃ dhammasamaya^eb^nti evaṃ samāgate devakāye disvā mayampi imaṃ dhammasamūhaṃ āgatā. kiṃ kāraṇā? ^b^dakkhitāye aparājitasaṅghaṃ,^eb^ kenaci aparājitaṃ ajjeva tayo māre madditvā vijitasaṅgāmaṃ imaṃ aparājitasaṅghaṃ dassanatthāya āgatamhāti attho. so pana brahmā imaṃ gāthaṃ bhāsitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā puratthimacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃyeva aṭṭhāsi.

[03] atha dutiyo vuttanayeneva āgantvā abhāsi. tattha ^b^tatra bhikkhavo^eb^ti tasmiṃ sannipātaṭṭhāne bhikkhū. ^b^samādahaṃsū^eb^ti samādhinā yojesuṃ. ^b^cittamattano ujukaṃ akaṃsū^eb^ti attano cittaṃ sabbe vaṅkakuṭilajimhabhāve haritvā ujukaṃ akariṃsu. ^b^sārathīva nettāni gahetvā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0274^ea^ yathā samappavattesu sindhavesu odhastapatodo sārathi sabbayottāni gahetvā acodento avārento tiṭṭhati, evaṃ chaḷaṅgupekkhāsamannāgatā guttadvārā sabbepete pañcasatā bhikkhū indriyāni rakkhanti paṇḍitā, ete daṭṭhuṃ idhāgatamha bhagavāti. sopi gantvā yathāṭhāneyeva aṭṭhāsi.

[03] atha ^a^P2.0681^ea^ tatiyo vuttanayeneva āgantvā abhāsi. tattha ^b^chetvā khīla^eb^nti rāgadosamohakhīlaṃ chinditvā. ^b^paligha^eb^nti rāgadosamohapalighameva. ^b^indakhīla^eb^ntipi rāgadosamohaindakhīlameva. ^b^ūhacca manejā^eb^ti ete taṇhāejāya abhāvena anejā bhikkhū indakhīlaṃ ūhacca samūhanitvā. ^b^te carantī^eb^ti catūsu disāsu appaṭihatacārikaṃ caranti. ^b^suddhā^eb^ti nirupakkilesā. ^b^vimalā^eb^ti nimmalā. idaṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ. ^b^cakkhumatā^eb^ti pañcahi cakkhūhi cakkhumantena. ^b^sudantā^eb^ti cakkhutopi dantā, sotatopi ghānatopi jivhātopi kāyatopi manatopi dantā. ^b^susunāgā^eb^ti taruṇanāgā. te evarūpena anuttarena yogācariyena damite taruṇanāge dassanāya āgatamha bhagavāti. sopi gantvā yathāṭhāneyeva aṭṭhāsi.
[03] atha catuttho vuttanayeneva āgantvā abhāsi. tattha ^b^gatāse^eb^ti nibbematikasaraṇagamanena gatā. sopi gantvā yathāṭhāneyeva aṭṭhāsi.

[03] 333^b^.^eb^ atha bhagavā olokento pathavītalato yāva cakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiparicchedā yāva akaniṭṭhabrahmalokā devatāsannipātaṃ disvā cintesi -- ``mahā ayaṃ devatāsamāgamo, bhikkhū pana evaṃ mahā devatāya samāgamoti na jānanti, handa, nesaṃ ācikkhāmī''ti, evaṃ cintetvā ^a^V2.0246^ea^ ``atha kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesī''ti sabbaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ. tattha ^b^etaparamā^eb^ti etaṃ paramaṃ pamāṇaṃ etesanti etaparamā. idāni buddhānaṃ pana abhāvā ``yepi te, bhikkhave, etarahī''ti tatiyo vāro na vutto. ^b^ācikkhissāmi, bhikkhave^eb^ti kasmā āha? devatānaṃ cittakallatājananatthaṃ. devatā kira cintesuṃ -- ``bhagavā evaṃ mahante samāgame mahesakkhānaṃyeva devatānaṃ nāmagottāni kathessati, appesakkhānaṃ kiṃ kathessatī''ti? atha ^a^M2.0275^ea^ bhagavā ``imā devatā kiṃ cintentī''ti āvajjanto mukhena hatthaṃ pavesetvā hadayamaṃsaṃ maddanto viya sabhaṇḍaṃ coraṃ gaṇhanto viya ca taṃ tāsaṃ cittācāraṃ ñatvā -- ``dasasahassacakkavāḷato āgatāgatānaṃ appesakkhamahesakkhānaṃ sabbāsampi devatānaṃ nāmagottaṃ kathessāmī''ti cintesi.

[03] buddhā nāma mahantā ete sattavisesā, yaṃ sadevakassa ^a^P2.0682^ea^ lokassa diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ pattaṃ pariyesitaṃ anuvicaritaṃ manasā, na kiñci katthaci nīlādivasena vibhattarūpārammaṇesu rūpārammaṇaṃ vā bherīsaddādivasena vibhattasaddārammaṇādīsu visuṃ visuṃ saddādiārammaṇaṃ vā atthi, yaṃ etesaṃ ñāṇamukhe āpāthaṃ nāgacchati. yathāha --

[02] ``yaṃ bhikkhave sadevakassa lokassa...pe0... sadevamanussāya diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ pattaṃ pariyesitaṃ anuvicaritaṃ manasā, tamahaṃ jānāmi, tamahaṃ passāmi, tamahaṃ abbhaññāsi''nti (a0 ni0 4.24).

[03] evaṃ sabbattha appaṭihatañāṇo bhagavā sabbāpi tā devatā bhabbābhabbavasena dve koṭṭhāse akāsi. ``kammāvaraṇena vā samannāgatā''tiādinā nayena vuttā sattā ^b^abhabbā^eb^ nāma. te ekavihāre vasantepi buddhā na olokenti. viparītā pana ^b^bhabbā^eb^ nāma, te dūre vasantepi gantvā saṅgaṇhanti. tasmā tasmimpi devatāsannipāte ye abhabbā, te pahāya bhabbe pariggahesi. pariggahetvā -- ``ettakā ettha rāgacaritā, ettakā dosacaritā, ettakā mohacaritā''ti caritavasena cha koṭṭhāse akāsi. atha nesaṃ sappāyaṃ dhammadesanaṃ upadhārayanto -- ``rāgacaritānaṃ devatānaṃ ^b^sammāparibbājaniyasuttaṃ^eb^ kathessāmi, dosacaritānaṃ ^b^kalahavivādasuttaṃ,^eb^ mohacaritānaṃ ^b^mahābyūhasuttaṃ,^eb^ vitakkacaritānaṃ ^b^cūḷabyūhasuttaṃ,^eb^ saddhācaritānaṃ ^b^tuvaṭṭakapaṭipadaṃ,^eb^ buddhicaritānaṃ ^b^purābhedasuttaṃ^eb^ kathessāmī''ti desanaṃ vavatthapetvā puna taṃ parisaṃ manasākāsi -- ``attajjhāsayena nu kho jāneyya, parajjhāsayena atthuppattikena pucchāvasenā''ti. tato ``pucchāvasena jāneyyā''ti ñatvā ``atthi nu kho koci devatānaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ gahetvā caritavasena pañhaṃ pucchituṃ samattho''ti ``tesu pañcasatesu bhikkhūsu ekopi ^a^V2.0247^ea^ na sakkotī''ti addasa. tato asītimahāsāvake dve aggasāvake ca samannāharitvā ``tepi ^a^M2.0276^ea^ na sakkontī''ti disvā cintesi ``sace paccekabuddho bhaveyya, sakkuṇeyya nu kho''ti ``sopi na sakkuṇeyyā''ti ñatvā ``sakkasuyāmādīsu koci sakkuṇeyyā''ti samannāhari. sace hi tesu koci sakkuṇeyya, taṃ pucchāpetvā attanā vissajjeyya, na pana tesupi koci sakkoti.

[03] athassa ^a^P2.0683^ea^ etadahosi -- ``mādiso buddhoyeva sakkuṇeyya, atthi pana katthaci añño buddho''ti anantāsu lokadhātūsu anantañāṇaṃ pattharitvā olokento aññaṃ buddhaṃ na addasa. anacchariyañcetaṃ, yaṃ idāni attanā samaṃ na passeyya, so jātadivasepi brahmajālavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayena attanā samaṃ apassanto -- ``aggohamasmi lokassā''ti appaṭivattiyaṃ sīhanādaṃ nadi. evaṃ aññaṃ attanā samaṃ apassitvā cintesi -- ``sace ahaṃ pucchitvā ahameva vissajjeyyaṃ, evampetā devatā na sakkhissanti paṭivijjhituṃ. aññasmiṃ pana buddheyeva pucchante mayi ca vissajjante accherakaṃ bhavissati, sakkhissanti ca devatā paṭivijjhituṃ, tasmā nimmitabuddhaṃ māpessāmī''ti abhiññāpādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya -- ``pattacīvaragahaṇaṃ ālokitavilokitaṃ samiñjitapasāritañca mama sadisaṃyeva hotū''ti kāmāvacaracittehi parikammaṃ katvā pācīnayugandharaparikkhepato ullaṅghamānaṃ candamaṇḍalaṃ bhinditvā nikkhamantaṃ viya rūpāvacaracittena adhiṭṭhāsi.

[03] devasaṅgho taṃ disvā -- ``aññopi nu kho, bho, cando uggato''ti āha. atha candaṃ ohāya āsannatare jāte ``na cando, sūriyo uggato''ti, puna āsannatare jāte ``na sūriyo, devavimānaṃ eka''nti, puna āsannatare jāte ``na devavimānaṃ, devaputto eko''ti, puna āsannatare jāte ``na devaputto, mahābrahmā eko''ti, puna āsannatare jāte ``na mahābrahmā, aparopi bho buddho āgato''ti āha. tattha puthujjanadevatā cintayiṃsu -- ``ekabuddhassa tāva ayaṃ devatāsannipāto, dvinnaṃ kīva mahanto bhavissatī''ti. ariyadevatā cintayiṃsu -- ``ekissā lokadhātuyā dve buddhā nāma natthi, addhā bhagavatā attanā sadiso añño eko buddho nimmito''ti.

[03] atha tassa devasaṅghassa passantasseva nimmitabuddho āgantvā dasabalaṃ avanditvāva sammukhaṭṭhāne samasamaṃ katvā māpite āsane nisīdi. bhagavatopi dvattiṃsa mahāpurisalakkhaṇāni, nimmitassāpi dvattiṃsāva, bhagavatopi ^a^M2.0277^ea^ sarīrā chabbaṇṇarasmiyo nikkhamanti ^a^V2.0248^ea^, nimmitassāpi, bhagavato sarīrarasmiyo nimmitassa sarīre paṭihaññanti, nimmitassa sarīrarasmiyo bhagavato kāye paṭihaññanti. tā dvinnampi buddhānaṃ sarīrato ^a^P2.0684^ea^ uggamma akaniṭṭhabhavanaṃ āhacca tato paṭinivattitvā devatānaṃ matthakapariyante otaritvā cakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ patiṭṭhahiṃsu. sakalacakkavāḷagabbhaṃ suvaṇṇamayavaṅkagopānasīvinaddhamiva cetiyagharaṃ virocittha. dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatā ekacakkavāḷe rāsibhūtā dvinnaṃ buddhānaṃ rasmigabbhantaraṃ pavisitvā aṭṭhaṃsu. nimmitabuddho nisīdantoyeva dasabalassa bodhipallaṅke kilesappahānaṃ abhitthavanto --
[21] ``pucchāmi muniṃ pahūtapaññaṃ,
[27] tiṇṇaṃ pāraṅgataṃ parinibbutaṃ ṭhitattaṃ.
[26] nikkhamma gharā panujja kāme,
[22] kathaṃ bhikkhu sammā so loke paribbajeyyā''ti.. (su0 ni0 361) --
[07] gāthaṃ abhāsi. satthā devatānaṃ tāva cittakallatājananatthaṃ āgatāgatānaṃ nāmagottāni kathessāmīti cintetvā ^b^ācikkhissāmi, bhikkhave^eb^tiādimāha.

[03] 334^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^silokamanukassāmī^eb^ti akkharapadaniyamitaṃ vacanasaṅghātaṃ pavattayissāmi. ^b^yattha bhummā tadassitā^eb^ti yesu yesu ṭhānesu bhummā devatā taṃ taṃ nissitā. ^b^ye sitā girigabbhara^eb^ntiādīhi tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vaṇṇaṃ kathesi, ye bhikkhū girikucchiṃ nissitāti attho. ^b^pahitattā^eb^ti pesitacittā. ^b^samāhitā^eb^ti avikkhittā.

[03] ^b^puthū^eb^ti bahujanā. ^b^sīhāva sallīnā^eb^ti sīhā viya nilīnā ekattaṃ upagatā. ^b^lomahaṃsābhisambhuno^eb^ti lomahaṃsaṃ abhibhavitvā ṭhitā, nibbhayāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^odātamanasā suddhā^eb^ti odātacittā hutvā suddhā. ^b^vippasannāmanāvilā^eb^ti vippasannānāvilā.

[03] ^b^bhiyyopañcasate ñatvā^eb^ti sammāsambuddhena saddhiṃ atirekapañcasate bhikkhū jānitvā. ^b^vane kāpilavatthave^eb^ti kapilavatthusamīpamhi jāte vanasaṇḍe. ^b^tato āmantayī satthā^eb^ti tadā āmantayi. ^b^sāvake^eb^ ^a^M2.0278^ea^ ^b^sāsane rate^eb^ti attano dhammadesanāya savanante jātattā sāvake ^a^P2.0685^ea^ sikkhattayasāsane ^a^V2.0249^ea^ ratattā sāsane rate. idaṃ sabbaṃ -- ``silokamanukassāmī''ti vacanato aññena vuttaṃ viya katvā vadati.

[03] ^b^devakāyā abhikkantā, te vijānātha bhikkhavo^eb^ti te dibbacakkhunā vijānāthāti nesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇābhinīhāratthāya kathesi. ^b^te ca ātappamakaruṃ, sutvā buddhassa sāsana^eb^nti te ca bhikkhū taṃ buddhasāsanaṃ sutvā tāvadeva tadatthāya vīriyaṃ kariṃsu.

[03] evaṃ katamattātappānaṃyeva ^b^tesaṃ pāturahu ñāṇaṃ.^eb^ kīdisaṃ? amanussānaṃ dassanaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ uppajji. na taṃ tehi tasmiṃ khaṇe parikammaṃ katvā uppāditaṃ. ariyamaggeneva hi taṃ nipphannaṃ. amanussadassanatthaṃ panassa abhinīhāramattameva kataṃ. satthāpi -- ``atthi tumhākaṃ ñāṇaṃ, taṃ nīharitvā tena hi te vijānāthā''ti idameva sandhāya ``te vijānātha, bhikkhavo''ti āha.
[03] ^b^appeke satamaddakkhu^eb^nti tesu bhikkhūsu ekacce bhikkhū amanussānaṃ sataṃ addasaṃsu. ^b^sahassaṃ atha sattari^eb^nti eke sahassaṃ. eke sattati sahassāni.

[03] ^b^sataṃ eke sahassāna^eb^nti eke satasahassaṃ addasaṃsu. ^b^appekenantamaddakkhu^eb^nti vipulaṃ addasaṃsu, satavasena sahassavasena ca aparicchinnepi addasaṃsūti attho. kasmā? yasmā ^b^disā sabbā phuṭā ahuṃ,^eb^ bharitā sampuṇṇāva ahesuṃ.

[03] ^b^tañca sabbaṃ abhiññāyā^eb^ti yaṃ tesu ekenekena diṭṭhaṃ, tañca sabbaṃ jānitvā. ^b^vavatthitvāna cakkhumā^eb^ti hatthatale lekhaṃ viya paccakkhato vavatthapetvā pañcahi cakkhūhi cakkhumā satthā. ^b^tato āmantayī^eb^ti pubbe vuttagāthameva nāmagottakittanatthāya āha. tumhe ete vijānātha, passatha, oloketha, ye vohaṃ kittayissāmīti ayamettha sambandho. ^b^girāhī^eb^ti vacanehi. ^b^anupubbaso^eb^ti anupaṭipāṭiyā.

[03] 335^b^.^eb^ ^b^sattasahassā te yakkhā, bhummā kāpilavatthavā^eb^ti sattasahassā tāvettha kapilavatthuṃ nissāya nibbattā bhummā yakkhāyevāti vadati ^a^M2.0279^ea^. ^b^iddhimanto^eb^ti ^a^P2.0686^ea^ dibbaiddhiyuttā. ^b^jutimanto^eb^ti ānubhāvasampannā. ^b^vaṇṇavanto^eb^ti sarīravaṇṇasampannā. ^b^yasassino^eb^ti parivārasampannā. ^b^modamānā abhikkāmu^eb^nti tuṭṭhacittā āgatā. ^b^bhikkhūnaṃ samitiṃ vana^eb^nti imaṃ mahāvanaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ santikaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ^a^V2.0250^ea^ dassanatthāya āgatā. atha vā ^b^samiti^eb^nti samūhaṃ, bhikkhusamūhaṃ dassanāya āgatātipi attho.
[03] ^b^chasahassā hemavatā, yakkhā nānattavaṇṇino^eb^ti chasahassā hemavatapabbate nibbattayakkhā, te ca sabbepi nīlādivaṇṇavasena nānattavaṇṇā.
[03] ^b^sātāgirā tisahassā^eb^ti sātāgiripabbate nibbattayakkhā tisahassā.
[03] ^b^iccete soḷasasahassā^eb^ti ete sabbepi soḷasasahassā honti.
[03] ^b^vessāmittā pañcasatā^eb^ti vessāmittapabbate nibbattā pañcasatā.

[03] ^b^kumbhīro rājagahiko^eb^ti rājagahanagare nibbatto kumbhīro nāma yakkho. ^b^vepullassa nivesana^eb^nti tassa vepullapabbato nivesanaṃ nivāsanaṭṭhānanti attho. ^b^bhiyyo naṃ satasahassaṃ, yakkhānaṃ payirupāsatī^eb^ti taṃ atirekaṃ yakkhānaṃ satasahassaṃ payirupāsati. ^b^kumbhīro rājagahiko, sopāgā samitiṃ vana^eb^nti sopi kumbhīro saparivāro imaṃ vanaṃ bhikkhusamitiṃ dassanatthāya āgato.

[03] 336^b^.^eb^ ^b^purimañca disaṃ rājā, dhataraṭṭho pasāsatī^eb^ti pācīnadisaṃ anusāsati. ^b^gandhabbānaṃ adhipatī^eb^ti catūsupi disāsu gandhabbānaṃ jeṭṭhako. sabbe te tassa vase vattanti. ^b^mahārājā yasassiso^eb^ti mahāparivāro eso mahārājā.
[03] ^b^puttāpi^eb^ ^a^M2.0280^ea^ ^b^tassa bahavo, indanāmā mahabbalā^eb^ti tassa dhataraṭṭhassa bahavo mahabbalā puttā, te sabbe sakkassa devarañño nāmadhārakā.
[03] ^b^virūḷho taṃ pasāsatī^eb^ti taṃ disaṃ virūḷho anusāsati.
[03] ^b^puttāpi tassā^eb^ti tassāpi tādisāyeva puttā. pāḷiyaṃ pana ``mahabbalā''ti likhanti. aṭṭhakathāyaṃ sabbavāresu ``mahābalā''ti pāṭho.
[21] ``purimaṃ ^a^P2.0687^ea^ ^a^V2.0251^ea^ disaṃ dhataraṭṭho, dakkhiṇena virūḷhako.
[22] pacchimena virūpakkho, kuvero uttaraṃ disaṃ..
[21] cattāro te mahārājā, samantā caturo disā.
[22] daddallamānā aṭṭhaṃsu, vane kāpilavatthave''ti..
[03] imā pana gāthā sabbasaṅgāhikavasena vuttā.

[03] ayañcettha attho -- dasasahassacakkavāḷe dhataraṭṭhā nāma mahārājāno atthi. te sabbepi koṭisatasahassakoṭisatasahassagandhabbaparivārā āgantvā puratthimāya disāya kapilavatthumahāvanato paṭṭhāya cakkavāḷagabbhaṃ pūretvā ṭhitā. evaṃ dakkhiṇadisādīsu virūḷhakādayo. tenevāha -- ``samantā caturo disā, daddallamānā aṭṭhaṃsū''ti. idañhi vuttaṃ hoti -- ``samantā cakkavāḷehi āgantvā caturo disā pabbatamatthakesu aggikkhandhā viya suṭṭhu jalamānā ṭhitā''ti. te pana yasmā kapilavatthuvanameva sandhāya āgatā, tasmā cakkavāḷaṃ pūretvā cakkavāḷena samasamā ṭhitāpi -- ``vane kāpilavatthave''ti vuttā.

[03] 337^b^.^eb^ ^b^tesaṃ māyāvino dāsā, āguṃ vañcanikā saṭhā^eb^ti tesaṃ mahārājānaṃ katapāpapaṭicchādanalakkhaṇāya māyāya yuttā kuṭilācārā dāsā atthi, ye sammukhaparammukhavañcanāhi lokaṃ vañcanato ``vañcanikā''ti ca, kerāṭiyasāṭheyyena samannāgatattā ``saṭhā''ti ca vuccanti, tepi āgatāti attho. ^b^māyā kuṭeṇḍu viṭeṇḍu, viṭucca viṭuṭo sahā^eb^ti te dāsā sabbepi māyākārakāva. nāmena panettha eko ^b^kuṭeṇḍu^eb^ nāma, eko ^b^viṭeṇḍu^eb^ nāma. pāḷiyaṃ pana ``veṭeṇḍū''ti likhanti. eko ^b^viṭucca^eb^ nāma, eko ^b^viṭuṭo^eb^ nāma. ^b^sahā^eb^ti sopi viṭuṭo tehi saheva āgato.

[03] ^b^candano^eb^ ^a^M2.0281^ea^ ^b^kāmaseṭṭho ca, kinnighaṇḍu nighaṇḍu cā^eb^ti aparo kinnighaṇḍu nāma. pāḷiyaṃ pana ``kinnughaṇḍū''ti likhanti. ^b^nighaṇḍu cā^eb^ti añño nighaṇḍu nāma, ettakā dāsā. ito pare pana --
[21] ``panādo ^a^V2.0252^ea^ opamañño ca, devasuto ca mātali.
[27] cittaseno ca gandhabbo, naḷo rājā janesabho.
[22] āguṃ pañcasikho ceva, timbarū sūriyavacchasā''ti.. --

[03] ime ^a^P2.0688^ea^ devarājāno. tattha ^b^devasuto^eb^ti devasārathi. ^b^cittaseno^eb^ti citto ca seno ca cittaseno ca. ^b^gandhabbo^eb^ti ayaṃ cittaseno gandhabbakāyiko devaputto, na kevalaṃ cesa, sabbe pete panādādayo gandhabbā eva. ^b^naḷorājā^eb^ti naḷakāradevaputto nāmeko. ^b^janesabho^eb^ti janavasabho devaputto. ^b^āguṃ pañcasikho cevā^eb^ti pañcasikho ceva devaputto āgato. ^b^timbarū^eb^ti timbarū nāma gandhabbadevarājā. ^b^sūriyavacchasā^eb^ti tasseva dhītā.

[03] ^b^ete caññe ca rājāno, gandhabbā saha rājubhī^eb^ti ete ca nāmavasena vuttagandhabbarājāno aññe ca etehi rājūhi saddhiṃ bahū gandhabbā. ^b^modamānā abhikkāmuṃ, bhikkhūnaṃ samitiṃ vana^eb^nti haṭṭhatuṭṭhacittā bhikkhusaṅghasamitiṃ imaṃ vanaṃ āgatāti attho.

[03] 338^b^.^eb^ ^b^athāguṃ nāgasā nāgā, vesālā sahatacchakā^eb^ti nāgasadahavāsikā ca vesālīvāsikā ca nāgā saha tacchakanāgaparisāya āgatāti attho. ^b^kambalassatarā^eb^ti kambalo ca assataro ca. ete kira sinerupāde vasanti, supaṇṇehipi anuddharaṇīyā mahesakkhanāgā ^b^pāyāgā saha ñātibhī^eb^ti payāgatitthavāsino ca saha ñātisaṅghena āgatā.

[03] ^b^yāmunā dhataraṭṭhā cā^eb^ti yamunavāsino ca dhataraṭṭhakule uppannā nāgā ca. ^b^erāvaṇo mahānāgo^eb^ti erāvaṇo ca devaputto, jātiyā nāgo na hoti. nāgavohārena panesa vohariyati. ^b^sopāgā^eb^ti sopi āgato.

[03] ^b^ye^eb^ ^a^M2.0282^ea^ ^b^nāgarāje sahasā harantī^eb^ti ye ime vuttappakāre nāge lobhābhibhūtā sāhasaṃ katvā haranti gaṇhanti. ^b^dibbā dijā pakkhī visuddhacakkhū^eb^ti dibbānubhāvato dibbā mātukucchito ca aṇḍakosato cāti dve vāre jātāti dijā pakkhayuttatāya pakkhī yojanasatantarepi yojanasahassantarepi nāge dassanasamatthacakkhutāya visuddhacakkhū. ^b^vehāyasā^eb^ ^a^P2.0689^ea^ ^b^te vanamajjhappattā^eb^ti te ākāseneva imaṃ mahāvanaṃ sampattā. ^b^citrā supaṇṇā iti tesa nāma^eb^nti tesaṃ ``citrasupaṇṇā''ti nāmaṃ.

[03] ^b^abhayaṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0253^ea^ ^b^tadā nāgarājānamāsi, supaṇṇato khemamakāsi buddho^eb^ti tasmā sabbepi te aññamaññaṃ ^b^saṇhāhi vācāhi upavhayantā^eb^ mittā viya bandhavā viya ca samullapantā sammodamānā āliṅgantā hatthe gaṇhantā aṃsakūṭe hatthaṃ ṭhapentā haṭṭhatuṭṭhacittā. ^b^nāgā supaṇṇā saraṇamakaṃsu buddha^eb^nti buddhaṃyeva saraṇaṃ gatā.

[03] 339^b^.^eb^ ^b^jitā vajirahatthenā^eb^ti indena devaraññā jitā. ^b^samuddaṃ asurāsitā^eb^ti mahāsamuddavāsino sujātāya asurakaññāya kāraṇā sabbepi ^b^bhātaro vāsavassete, iddhimanto yasassino.^eb^

[03] tesu ^b^kālakañcā mahābhismā^eb^ti kālakañcā ca mahante bhiṃsane attabhāve māpetvā āgamiṃsu. ^b^asurā dānaveghasāti dānaveghasā^eb^ nāma aññe dhanuggahāsurā. ^b^vepacitti sucitti ca, pahārādo namucī sahā^eb^ti vepacittiasuro, sucittiasuro cāti ete ca asurā namuci ca māro devaputto etehi saheva āgato. ime asurā mahāsamuddavāsino, ayaṃ paranimmitadevalokavāsī, kasmā etehi sahāgatoti? acchandikattā. tepi hi acchandikā abhabbā, ayampi tādisoyeva. tasmā dhātuso saṃsandamāno āgato.

[03] ^b^satañca baliputtāna^eb^nti balino mahāasurassa puttānaṃ sataṃ. ^b^sabbe verocanāmakā^eb^ti sabbe attano mātulassa rāhusseva nāmadharā. ^b^sannayhitvā balisena^eb^nti attano balisenaṃ sannayhitvā sabbe katasannāhāva hutvā. ^b^rāhubhaddamupāgamu^eb^nti rāhuasurindaṃ upasaṅkamiṃsu. ^b^samayo^eb^ ^a^M2.0283^ea^ ^b^dāni bhaddante^eb^ti bhaddaṃ tava hotu, samayo te bhikkhūnaṃ samitiṃ vanaṃ upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ dassanāyāti attho.

[03] 340^b^.^eb^ ^b^āpo ca devā pathavī, tejo vāyo tadāgamu^eb^nti āpokasiṇādīsu parikammaṃ katvā nibbattā ^b^āpo^eb^tiādināmakā devā āgamuṃ. ^b^varuṇā vāraṇā devā, somo ca yasasā sahā^eb^ti varuṇadevatā ^a^P2.0690^ea^, vāraṇadevatā, somadevatāti evaṃ nāmakā ca devā yasasā nāma devena sahāgatāti attho. ^b^mettākaruṇākāyikā^eb^ti mettājhāne ca karuṇājhāne ca parikammaṃ katvā nibbattadevā. ^b^āguṃ devā yasassino^eb^ti etepi mahāyasā devā āgatā.
[03] ^b^dasete dasadhā kāyā, sabbe nānattavaṇṇino^eb^ti te dasadhā ṭhitā dasa devakāyā sabbe nīlādivasena nānattavaṇṇā āgatāti attho.

[03] ^b^veṇḍū^eb^ ^a^V2.0254^ea^ ^b^ca devā^eb^ti veṇḍudevatā ca. ^b^sahali cā^eb^ti sahalidevatā ca. ^b^asamā ca duve yamā^eb^ti asamadevatā ca dve ca yamakā devā. ^b^candassupanisā devā, candamāguṃ purakkhatvā^eb^ti candanissitakā devā candaṃ purato katvā āgatā. tathā sūriyanissitakā devā sūriyaṃ purakkhatvā. ^b^nakkhattāni purakkhatvā^eb^ti nakkhattanissitāpi devā nakkhattāni purato katvā āgatā. ^b^āguṃ mandavalāhakā^eb^ti vātavalāhakā, abbhavalāhakā, uṇhavalāhakā ete sabbepi valāhakāyikā ``mandavalāhakā'' nāma vuccanti. tepi āgatāti attho. ^b^vasūnaṃ vāsavo seṭṭho, sakkopāgā purindado^eb^ti vasūnaṃ devatānaṃ seṭṭho vāsavo yo sakkoti ca, purindadoti ca vuccati, sopi āgato.
[03] ^b^dasete dasadhā kāyā^eb^ti etepi dasa devakāyā dasadhāva āgatā. ^b^sabbe nānattavaṇṇino^eb^ti nīlādivasena nānattavaṇṇā.

[03] ^b^athāguṃ sahabhū devā^eb^ti atha sahabhū nāma devā āgatā. ^b^jalamaggisikhārivā^eb^ti aggisikhā viya jalantā. jalamaggi ca sikhārivāti imāni tesaṃ nāmānītipi vuttaṃ. ^b^ariṭṭhakā ca rojā cā^eb^ti ariṭṭhakadevā ca rojadevā ca. ^b^umāpupphanibhāsino^eb^ti ^b^umāpupphadevā^eb^ nāma ete devā ^a^M2.0284^ea^. umāpupphasadisā hi tesaṃ sarīrābhā, tasmā ``umāpupphanibhāsino''ti vuccanti.

[03] ^b^varuṇā sahadhammā cā^eb^ti ete ca dve janā. ^b^accutā ca anejakā^eb^ti accutadevatā ca anejakadevatā ca. ^b^suleyyarucirā^eb^ ^a^P2.0691^ea^ ^b^āgu^eb^nti suleyyā ca rucirā ca āgatā. ^b^āguṃ vāsavanesino^eb^ti vāsavanesīdevā nāma āgatā. ^b^dasete dasadhā kāyā^eb^ti etepi dasadevakāyā dasadhāva āgatā.

[03] ^b^samānā mahāsamānā^eb^ti samānā ca mahāsamānā ca. ^b^mānusā mānusuttamā^eb^ti mānusā ca mānusuttamā ca. ^b^khiḍḍāpadosikā āguṃ, āguṃ manopadosikā^eb^ti khiḍḍāpadosikā manopadosikā ca devā āgatā.

[03] ^b^athāguṃ harayo devā^eb^ti haridevā nāma āgatā. ^b^ye ca lohitavāsino^eb^ti lohitavāsino ca āgatā. ^b^pāragā mahāpāragā^eb^ti ete ca duvidhā āgatā. ^b^dasete dasadhā kāyā^eb^ti etepi dasadevakāyā dasadhāva āgatā.

[03] ^b^sukkā^eb^ ^a^V2.0255^ea^ ^b^karambhā aruṇā, āguṃ veghanasā sahā^eb^ti ete sukkādayo tayo, tehi saha veghanasā ca āgatā. ^b^odātagayhā pāmokkhā^eb^ti odātagayhā nāma pāmokkhadevā āgatā. ^b^āguṃ devā vicakkhaṇā^eb^ti vicakkhaṇā nāma devā āgatā.

[03] ^b^sadāmattā hāragajā^eb^ti sadāmattā ca hāragajā ca. ^b^missakā ca yasassino^eb^ti yasasampannā missakadevā ca. ^b^thanayaṃ āga pajjunno^eb^ti pajjunno ca devarājā thanayanto āgato. ^b^yo disā abhivassatī^eb^ti yo yaṃ yaṃ disaṃ yāti, tattha tattha devo vassati. ^b^dasete dasadhā kāyā^eb^ti etepi dasadevakāyā dasadhā āgatā.

[03] ^b^khemiyā tusitā yāmā^eb^ti khemiyā devā tusitapuravāsino ca yāmādevalokavāsino ca. ^b^kathakā ca yasassino^eb^ti yasasampannā kathakadevā ca. pāḷiyaṃ pana ``kaṭṭhakā cā''ti likhanti. ^b^lambītakā lāmaseṭṭhā^eb^ti lambitakadevā ca lāmaseṭṭhadevā ca. ^b^jotināmā ca āsavā^eb^ti pabbatamatthake katanaḷaggikkhandho viya jotamānā jotidevā nāma atthi, te ca āsā ca devā āgatāti attho. pāḷiyaṃ ^a^M2.0285^ea^ pana ``jātināmā''ti likhanti. āsā devatā chandavasena ^b^āsavā^eb^ti vuttā. ^b^nimmānaratino āguṃ, athāguṃ paranimmitā. dasete dasadhā kāyā^eb^ti etepi dasa devakāyā dasadhāva āgatā.

[03] ^b^saṭṭhete^eb^ ^a^P2.0692^ea^ ^b^devanikāyā^eb^ti ete ca āpo ca devātiādikā cha dasakā saṭṭhi devanikāyā sabbe nīlādivasena nānattavaṇṇino. ^b^nāmanvayena āgacchu^eb^nti nāmabhāgena nāmakoṭṭhāsena āgatā. ^b^ye caññe sadisā sahā^eb^ti ye ca aññepi tehi sadisā vaṇṇatopi nāmatopi etādisāyeva sesacakkavāḷesu devā, tepi āgatāyevāti ekapadeneva kalāpaṃ viya puṭakaṃ viya ca katvā sabbā devatā niddisati.

[03] evaṃ dasasu lokadhātusahassesu devakāye niddisitvā idāni yadatthaṃ te āgatā, taṃ dassento ^b^pavuṭṭhajāti^eb^nti gāthamāha. tassattho -- pavuṭṭhā vigatā jāti assāti ariyasaṅgho pavuṭṭhajāti nāma, ^b^taṃ pavuṭṭhajātiṃ^eb^ rāgadosamohakhīlānaṃ abhāvā ^b^akhīlaṃ^eb^ cattāro oghe taritvā ṭhitattā ^b^oghatiṇṇaṃ^eb^ catunnaṃ āsavānaṃ abhāvena ^b^anāsavaṃ^eb^ ariyasaṅghaṃ dakkhema passissāma. tesaññeva oghānaṃ tiṇṇattā ^b^oghataraṃ^eb^ āguṃ akaraṇato ^b^nāgaṃ. asitātiga^eb^nti kāḷakabhāvātītaṃ candaṃva siriyā virocamānaṃ dasabalañca dakkhema passissāmāti etadatthaṃ sabbepi te nāmanvayena āgacchuṃ, ye caññe sadisā sahāti.

[03] 341^b^.^eb^ idāni ^a^V2.0256^ea^ brahmāno dassento ^b^subrahmā paramatto cā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^subrahmā^eb^ti eko brahmā. paramattopi brahmāva. ^b^puttā iddhimato sahā^eb^ti ete iddhimato buddhassa bhagavato puttā ariyabrahmāno saheva āgatā. ^b^sanaṅkumāro tisso cā^eb^ti sanaṅkumāro ca tissamahābrahmā ca. ^b^sopāgā^eb^ti sopi āgato.
[21] ``sahassaṃ brahmalokānaṃ, mahābrahmābhitiṭṭhati.
[22] upapanno jutimanto, bhismākāyo yasassi so''ti.. --

[03] ettha ^a^M2.0286^ea^ ^b^sahassaṃ brahmalokāna^eb^nti ekaṅguliyā ekasahassacakkavāḷe dasahi aṅgulīhi dasasahassicakkavāḷe ālokapharaṇasamatthānaṃ mahābrahmānaṃ sahassaṃ āgataṃ. ^b^mahābrahmābhitiṭṭhatī^eb^ti yattha ekeko mahābrahmā aññe brahme abhibhavitvā tiṭṭhati. ^b^upapanno^eb^ti ^a^P2.0693^ea^ brahmaloke nibbatto. ^b^jutimanto^eb^ti ānubhāvasampanno. ^b^bhismākāyo^eb^ti mahākāyo, dvīhi tīhi māgadhikehi gāmakkhettehi samappamāṇāttabhāvo. ^b^yasassiso^eb^ti attabhāvasirīsaṅkhātena yasena samannāgato.

[03] ^b^dasettha issarā āguṃ, paccekavasavattino^eb^ti etasmiñca brahmasahasse ye pāṭiyekkaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ vasaṃ vattenti, evarūpā dasa issarā mahābrahmāno āgatā. ^b^tesañca majjhato āga, hārito parivārito^eb^ti tesaṃ brahmānaṃ majjhe hārito nāma mahābrahmā satasahassabrahmaparivāro āgato.

[03] 342^b^.^eb^ ^b^te ca sabbe abhikkante, sainde deve sabrahmake^eb^ti te sabbepi sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā āgate devakāye, hāritamahābrahmānaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā āgate brahmakāye ca. ^b^mārasenā abhikkāmī^eb^ti mārasenā abhigatā. ^b^passa kaṇhassa mandiya^eb^nti kāḷakassa mārasa bālabhāvaṃ passatha.

[03] ^b^etha gaṇhatha bandhathā^eb^ti evaṃ attano parisaṃ āṇāpesi. ^b^rāgena baddhamatthu vo^eb^ti sabbaṃ vo idaṃ devamaṇḍalaṃ rāgena baddhaṃ hotu. ^b^samantā parivāretha, mā vo muñcittha koci na^eb^nti tumhākaṃ ekopi etesu ekampi mā muñci. ``mā vo muñcethā''tipi pāṭho, esevattho.

[03] ^b^iti tattha mahāseno, kaṇho senaṃ apesayī^eb^ti evaṃ tattha mahāsamaye mahāseno māro mārasenaṃ ^a^V2.0257^ea^ apesayi. ^b^pāṇinā talamāhaccā^eb^ti hatthena pathavītalaṃ paharitvā. ^b^saraṃ katvāna bherava^eb^nti māravibhiṃsakadassanatthaṃ bhayānakaṃ sarañca katvā.

[03] ^b^yathā pāvussako megho, thanayanto savijjuko^eb^ti savijjuko pāvussakamegho viya mahāgajjitaṃ gajjanto. ^b^tadā so paccudāvattī^eb^ti tasmiṃ samaye so māro taṃ vibhiṃsanakaṃ dassetvā paṭinivatto ^a^M2.0287^ea^. ^b^saṅkuddho asayaṃ vase^eb^ti suṭṭhu kuddho kupito kañci vase vattetuṃ ^a^P2.0694^ea^ asakkonto asayaṃvase asayaṃvasī attano vasena akāmako hutvā nivatto. bhagavā kira ``ayaṃ māro imaṃ mahāsamāgamaṃ disvā `abhisamayantarāyaṃ karissāmī'ti antarantare mārasenaṃ pesetvā māraṃ vibhiṃsakaṃ dassetī''ti aññāsi. pakati cesā bhagavato, yattha abhisamayo na bhavissati, tattha māraṃ vibhiṃsakaṃ dassentaṃ na nivāreti. yattha pana abhisamayo hoti, tattha yathā parisā neva mārassa rūpaṃ passati, na saddaṃ suṇāti, evaṃ adhiṭṭhātīti. imasmiñca samāgame mahābhisamayo bhavissati, tasmā yathā devatā neva tassa rūpaṃ passanti, na saddaṃ suṇanti, evaṃ adhiṭṭhāsi. tena vuttaṃ --``tadā so paccudāvatti, saṅkuddho asayaṃvase''ti.
[03] 343^b^.^eb^ ^b^tañca sabbaṃ abhiññāya, vavatthitvāna cakkhumā^eb^ti taṃ sabbaṃ bhagavā jānitvā vavatthapetvā ca.

[03] ^b^mārasenā abhikkantā, te vijānātha bhikkhavo^eb^ti bhikkhave mārasenā abhikkantā, te tumhe attano anurūpaṃ vijānātha, phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjathāti vadati. ^b^ātappamakaru^eb^nti phalasamāpattiṃ pavisanatthāya vīriyaṃ ārabhiṃsu. ^b^vītarāgehi pakkāmu^eb^nti māro ca mārasenā ca vītarāgehi ariyehi dūratova apakkamuṃ. ^b^nesaṃ lomāpi iñjayu^eb^nti tesaṃ vītarāgānaṃ lomānipi na cālayiṃsu. atha māro bhikkhusaṅghaṃ ārabbha imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi --
[21] ``sabbe vijitasaṅgāmā, bhayātītā yasassino.
[22] modanti saha bhūtehi, sāvakā te janesutā''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^modanti saha bhūtehī^eb^ti dasabalassa sāsane bhūtehi sañjātehi ariyehi saddhiṃ modanti pamodanti. ^b^janesutā^eb^ti jane vissutā pākaṭā abhiññātā.

[03] idaṃ ^a^V2.0258^ea^ pana mahāsamayasuttaṃ nāma devatānaṃ piyaṃ manāpaṃ, tasmā maṅgalaṃ vadantena abhinavaṭṭhānesu idameva suttaṃ vattabbaṃ. devatā kira --``imaṃ suttaṃ suṇissāmā''ti ^a^P2.0695^ea^ ohitasotā vicaranti. desanāpariyosāne panassa ^a^M2.0288^ea^ koṭisatasahassadevatā arahattaṃ pattā, sotāpannādīnaṃ gaṇanā natthi.

[03] devatānañcassa piyamanāpabhāve idaṃ vatthu -- koṭipabbatavihāre kira nāgaleṇadvāre nāgarukkhe ekā devadhītā vasati. eko daharo antoleṇe imaṃ suttaṃ sajjhāyati. devadhītā sutvā suttapariyosāne mahāsaddena sādhukāramadāsi. ko esoti. ahaṃ, bhante, devadhītāti. kasmā sādhukāramadāsīti? bhante, dasabalena mahāvane nisīditvā kathitadivase imaṃ suttaṃ sutvā ajja assosiṃ, bhagavatā kathitato ekakkharampi ahāpetvā suggahito ayaṃ dhammo tumhehīti. dasabalassa kathayato sutaṃ tayāti? āma, bhanteti. mahā kira devatāsannipāto ahosi, tvaṃ kattha ṭhitā suṇīti?

[03] ahaṃ, bhante, mahāvanavāsiyā devatā, mahesakkhāsu pana devatāsu āgacchantīsu jambudīpe okāsaṃ nālatthaṃ, atha imaṃ tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ āgantvā jambukolapaṭṭane ṭhatvā sotuṃ āraddhamhi, tatrāpi mahesakkhāsu devatāsu āgacchantīsu anukkamena paṭikkamamānā rohaṇajanapade mahāgāmassa piṭṭhibhāgato samudde galappamāṇaṃ udakaṃ pavisitvā tattha ṭhitā assosinti. tuyhaṃ ṭhitaṭṭhānato dūre satthāraṃ passasi devateti? kiṃ kathetha, bhante, satthā mahāvane dhammaṃ desento nirantaraṃ mamaññeva oloketīti maññamānā otappamānā ūmīsu nilayāmīti.

[03] taṃ divasaṃ kira koṭisatasahassadevatā arahattaṃ pattā, tumhepi tadā arahattaṃ pattāti? natthi, bhante. anāgāmiphalaṃ pattattha maññeti? natthi, bhante. sakadāgāmiphalaṃ pattattha maññeti? natthi, bhante. tayo magge pattā devatā kira gaṇanapathaṃ ^a^P2.0696^ea^ atītā, sotāpannā jātattha maññeti? devatā taṃ divasaṃ sotāpattiphalaṃ pattattā harāyamānā --``apucchitabbaṃ pucchati ayyo''ti āha. tato naṃ so bhikkhu āha -- ``sakkā pana devate, tava attabhāvaṃ amhākaṃ dassetu''nti? na sakkā bhante sakalakāyaṃ ^a^M2.0289^ea^ dassetuṃ, aṅgulipabbamattaṃ dassessāmi ayyassāti kuñcikachiddena aṅguliṃ antoleṇābhimukhaṃ akāsi, candasahassasūriyasahassauggamanakālo viya ahosi. devadhītā ``appamattā, bhante, hothā''ti daharabhikkhuṃ ^a^V2.0259^ea^ vanditvā agamāsi. evaṃ imaṃ suttaṃ devatānaṃ piyaṃ manāpaṃ, mamāyanti naṃ devatāti.
[06] iti sumaṅgalavilāsiniyā dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
[06] mahāsamayasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 344^b^.^eb^ ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^P3.0697^ea^ ^a^V2.0260^ea^ ^a^M2.0290^ea^ ^b^me suta^eb^nti sakkapañhasuttaṃ. tatrāyamanuttānapadavaṇṇanā -- ^b^ambasaṇḍā nāma brāhmaṇagāmo^eb^ti so kira gāmo ambasaṇḍānaṃ avidūre niviṭṭho, tasmā ``ambasaṇḍā'' tveva vuccati. ^b^vediyake pabbate^eb^ti so kira pabbato pabbatapāde jātena maṇivedikāsadisena nīlavanasaṇḍena samantā parikkhitto, tasmā `vediyakapabbato' tveva saṅkhyaṃ gato. ^b^indasālaguhāya^eb^nti pubbepi sā dvinnaṃ pabbatānaṃ antare guhā, indasālarukkho cassā dvāre, tasmā `indasālaguhā'ti saṅkhyaṃ gatā. atha naṃ kuṭṭehi parikkhipitvā dvāravātapānāni yojetvā supariniṭṭhitasudhākammamālākammalatākammavicittaṃ leṇaṃ katvā bhagavato adaṃsu. purimavohāravasena pana ``indasālaguhā'' tveva naṃ sañjānanti. taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ `indasālaguhāya'nti.

[03] ^b^ussukkaṃ udapādī^eb^ti dhammiko ussāho uppajji. nanu ca esa abhiṇhadassāvī bhagavato, na so devatāsannipāto nāma atthi, yatthāyaṃ na āgatapubbo, sakkena sadiso appamādavihārī devaputto nāma natthi. atha kasmā buddhadassanaṃ anāgatapubbassa viya assa ussāho udapādīti? maraṇabhayena santajjitattā. tasmiṃ kirassa samaye āyu parikkhīṇo, so pañca pubbanimittāni disvā ``parikkhīṇo ^a^P3.0698^ea^ dāni me āyū''ti aññāsi. yesañca devaputtānaṃ maraṇanimittāni āvi bhavanti, tesu ye parittakena puññakammena devaloke nibbattā, te ``kuhiṃ nu kho idāni nibbattissāmā''ti bhayaṃ santāsaṃ āpajjanti. ye katabhīruttānā bahuṃ puññaṃ katvā nibbattā, te attanā dinnadānaṃ rakkhitasīlaṃ bhāvitabhāvanañca āgamma ``uparidevaloke sampattiṃ anubhavissāmā''ti na bhāyanti.

[03] sakko ^a^V2.0261^ea^ pana devarājā pubbanimittāni disvā dasayojanasahassaṃ devanagaraṃ, yojanasahassubbedhaṃ vejayantaṃ, tiyojanasatikaṃ sudhammadevasabhaṃ, yojanasatubbedhaṃ pāricchattakaṃ, saṭṭhiyojanikaṃ paṇḍukambalasilaṃ, aḍḍhatiyā nāṭakakoṭiyo dvīsu devalokesu devaparisaṃ, nandanavanaṃ, cittalatāvanaṃ ^a^M2.0291^ea^, missakavanaṃ, phārusakavananti etaṃ sabbasampattiṃ oloketvā ``nassati vata bho me ayaṃ sampattī''ti bhayābhibhūto ahosi.

[03] tato ``atthi nu kho koci samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā lokapitāmaho mahābrahmā vā, yo me hadayanissitaṃ sokasallaṃ samuddharitvā imaṃ sampattiṃ thāvaraṃ kareyyā''ti olokento kañci adisvā puna addasa ``mādisānaṃ satasahassānampi uppannaṃ sokasallaṃ sammāsambuddho uddharituṃ paṭibalo''ti. athevaṃ parivitakkentassa tena kho pana samayena sakkassa devānamindassa ussukkaṃ udapādi bhagavantaṃ dassanāya.

[03] ^b^kahaṃ nu kho bhagavā etarahi viharatī^eb^ti katarasmiṃ janapade kataraṃ nagaraṃ upanissāya kassa paccaye paribhuñjanto kassa amataṃ dhammaṃ desayamāno viharatīti. ^b^addasā kho^eb^ti addakkhi paṭivijjhi. ^b^mārisā^eb^ti piyavacanametaṃ, devatānaṃ pāṭiyekko vohāro. niddukkhātipi vuttaṃ hoti. kasmā panesa deve āmantesi? sahāyatthāya. pubbe kiresa bhagavati saḷalaghare viharante ekakova dassanāya agamāsi. satthā ``aparipakkaṃ tāvassa ñāṇaṃ, katipāhaṃ pana atikkamitvā mayi indasālaguhāyaṃ viharante pañca pubbanimittāni disvā maraṇabhayabhīto dvīsu devalokesu devatāhi saddhiṃ upasaṅkamitvā cuddasa pañhe pucchitvā upekkhāpañhavissajjanāvasāne asītiyā devatāsahassehi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahissatī''ti cintetvā okāsaṃ nākāsi. so ``mama pubbepi ^a^P3.0699^ea^ ekakassa gatattā satthārā okāso na kato, addhā me natthi maggaphalassa upanissayo, ekassa pana upanissaye sati cakkavāḷapariyantāyapi parisāya bhagavā dhammaṃ desetiyeva. avassaṃ kho pana dvīsu devalokesu kassaci devassa upanissayo bhavissati, taṃ sandhāya satthā dhammaṃ desessati. taṃ sutvā ahampi attano domanassaṃ vūpasamessāmī''ti cintetvā sahāyatthāya āmantesi.

[03] ^b^evaṃ bhaddaṃ tavāti kho devā tāvatiṃsā^eb^ti evaṃ hotu mahārāja, gacchāma bhagavantaṃ dassanāya, dullabho buddhuppādo, bhaddaṃ tava, yo tvaṃ ``pabbatakīḷaṃ nadīkīḷaṃ gacchāmā''ti avatvā ^a^V2.0262^ea^ amhe evarūpesu ṭhānesu niyojesīti. ^b^paccassosu^eb^nti tassa vacanaṃ sirasā sampaṭicchiṃsu.

[03] 345^b^.^eb^ ^b^pañcasikhaṃ^eb^ ^a^M2.0292^ea^ ^b^gandhabbadevaputtaṃ āmantesī^eb^ti deve tāva āmantetu, imaṃ kasmā visuṃ āmantesi? okāsakaraṇatthaṃ. evaṃ kirassa ahosi ``dvīsu devalokesu devatā gahetvā dhurena paharantassa viya satthāraṃ upasaṅkamituṃ na yuttaṃ, ayaṃ pana pañcasikho dasabalassa upaṭṭhāko vallabho icchiticchitakkhaṇe gantvā pañhaṃ pucchitvā dhammaṃ suṇāti, imaṃ purato pesetvā okāsaṃ kāretvā iminā katokāse upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchissāmī''ti okāsakaraṇatthaṃ āmantesi.

[03] ^b^evaṃ bhaddaṃ tavā^eb^ti so ``evaṃ mahārāja, hotu, bhaddaṃ tava, yo tvaṃ maṃ `ehi, mārisa, uyyānakīḷādīni vā naṭasamajjādīni vā dassanāya gacchāmā'ti avatvā `buddhaṃ passissāma, dhammaṃ sossāmā'ti vadasī''ti daḷhataraṃ upatthambhento devānamindassa vacanaṃ paṭissutvā anucariyaṃ sahacaraṇaṃ ekato gamanaṃ upāgami.

[03] tattha ^b^beluvapaṇḍu^eb^nti beluvapakkaṃ viya paṇḍuvaṇṇaṃ. tassa kira sovaṇṇamayaṃ pokkharaṃ, indanīlamayo daṇḍo, rajatamayā tantiyo, pavāḷamayā veṭhakā, vīṇāpattakaṃ gāvutaṃ, tantibandhanaṭṭhānaṃ gāvutaṃ, upari daṇḍako gāvutanti tigāvutappamāṇā vīṇā. iti so taṃ vīṇaṃ ādāya samapaññāsamucchanā mucchetvā agganakhehi paharitvā madhuraṃ gītassaraṃ nicchāretvā sesadeve sakkassa gamanakālaṃ ^a^P3.0700^ea^ jānāpento ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. evaṃ tassa gītavāditasaññāya sannipatite devagaṇe ^b^atha kho sakko devānamindo...pe0... vediyake pabbate paccuṭṭhāsi. ^eb^

[03] 346^b^.^eb^ ^b^atiriva obhāsajāto^eb^ti aññesu divasesu ekasseva devassa vā mārassa vā brahmuno vā obhāsena obhāsajāto hoti, taṃdivasaṃ pana dvīsu devalokesu devatānaṃ obhāsena atiriva obhāsajāto ekapajjoto sahassacandasūriyauggatakālasadiso ahosi. ^b^parito gāmesu manussā^eb^ti samantā gāmesu manussā. pakatisāyamāsakāleyeva kira gāmamajjhe dārakesu kīḷantesu tattha sakko agamāsi, tasmā manussā passitvā evamāhaṃsu. nanu ca majjhimayāme devatā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamanti, ayaṃ kasmā ^a^M2.0293^ea^ paṭhamayāmassāpi purimabhāgeyeva āgatoti? maraṇabhayeneva tajjitattā. ^b^kiṃsu nāmā^eb^ti kiṃsu nāma bho etaṃ, ko nu kho ajja mahesakkho devo vā brahmā vā bhagavantaṃ pañhaṃ pucchituṃ dhammaṃ sotuṃ upasaṅkamanto, kathaṃsu ^a^V2.0263^ea^ nāma bho bhagavā pañhaṃ vissajjessati dhammaṃ desessati, lābhā amhākaṃ, yesaṃ no evaṃ devatānaṃ kaṅkhāvinodako satthā avidūre vihāre vasati, ye labhāma thālakabhikkhampi kaṭacchubhikkhampi dātunti saṃviggā lomahaṭṭhajātā uddhaggalomā hutvā dasanakhasamodhānasamujjalaṃ añjaliṃ sirasmiṃ patiṭṭhapetvā namassamānā aṭṭhaṃsu.

[03] 347^b^.^eb^ ^b^durupasaṅkamā^eb^ti dupayirupāsiyā. ahaṃ sarāgo sadoso samoho, satthā vītarāgo vītadoso vītamoho, tasmā dupayirupāsiyā tathāgatā mādisena. ^b^jhāyī^eb^ti lakkhaṇūpanijjhānena ca ārammaṇūpanijjhānena ca jhāyī. tasmiññeva jhāne ratāti ^b^jhānaratā. tadantaraṃ paṭisallīnā^eb^ti tadantaraṃ paṭisallīnā sampati paṭisallīnā vā. tasmā na kevalaṃ jhāyī jhānaratāti durupasaṅkamā, idānimeva paṭisallīnātipi durupasaṅkamā. ^b^pasādeyyāsī^eb^ti ārādheyyāsi, okāsaṃ me kāretvā dadeyyāsīti vadati. ^b^beluvapaṇḍuvīṇaṃ ādāyā^eb^ti nanu pubbeva ādinnāti? āma ^a^P3.0701^ea^, ādinnā. maggagamanavasena pana aṃsakūṭe laggitā, idāni naṃ vāmahatthe ṭhapetvā vādanasajjaṃ katvā ādiyi. tena vuttaṃ ``ādāyā''ti.
[03] 348^b^.^eb^ ^b^assāvesī^eb^ti sāvesi. ^b^buddhūpasañhitā^eb^ti buddhaṃ ārabbha buddhaṃ nissayaṃ katvā pavattāti attho. sesapadesupi eseva nayo.

[03] ^b^vande te pitaraṃ bhadde, timbaruṃ sūriyavacchase^eb^ti ettha ^b^sūriyavacchasā^eb^ti sūriyasamānasarīrā. tassā kira devadhītāya pādantato rasmi uṭṭhahitvā kesantaṃ ārohati, tasmā bālasūriyamaṇḍalasadisā khāyati, iti naṃ ``sūriyavacchasā''ti sañjānanti. taṃ sandhāyāha -- ``bhadde, sūriyavacchase, tava pitaraṃ timbaruṃ gandhabbadevarājānaṃ vandāmī''ti. ^b^yena jātāsi kalyāṇī^eb^ti yena ^a^M2.0294^ea^ kāraṇabhūtena yaṃ timbaruṃ devarājānaṃ nissāya tvaṃ jātā, kalyāṇī sabbaṅgasobhanā. ^b^ānandajananī mamā^eb^ti mayhaṃ pītisomanassavaḍḍhanī.

[03] ^b^vātova sedataṃ kanto^eb^ti yathā sañjātasedānaṃ sedaharaṇatthaṃ vāto iṭṭho hoti kanto manāpo, evanti attho. ^b^pānīyaṃva pipāsato^eb^ti pātumicchantassa pipāsato pipāsābhibhūtassa. ^b^aṅgīrasī^eb^ti aṅge rasmiyo assāti aṅgīrasī, tameva ārabbha ālapanto vadati. ^b^dhammo arahatāmivā^eb^ti arahantānaṃ navalokuttaradhammo viya.

[03] ^b^jighacchato^eb^ti ^a^V2.0264^ea^ bhuñjitukāmassa khudābhibhūtassa. ^b^jalantamiva vārinā^eb^ti yathā koci jalantaṃ jātavedaṃ udakakumbhena nibbāpeyya, evaṃ tava kāraṇā uppannaṃ mama kāmarāgapariḷāhaṃ nibbāpehīti vadati.

[03] ^b^yuttaṃ kiñjakkhareṇunā^eb^ti padumakesarareṇunā yuttaṃ. ^b^nāgo ghammābhitatto vā^eb^ti ghammābhitattahatthī viya. ^b^ogāhe te thanūdara^eb^nti yathā so nāgo pokkharaṇiṃ ogāhitvā pivitvā aggasoṇḍamattaṃ paññāyamānaṃ katvā nimuggo sukhaṃ sātaṃ vindati, evaṃ kadā nu kho te thanūdaraṃ thanavemajjhaṃ ^a^P3.0702^ea^ udarañca otaritvā ahaṃ sukhaṃ sātaṃ paṭilabhissāmīti vadati.
[21] ``accaṅkusova nāgova, jitaṃ me tuttatomaraṃ.
[22] kāraṇaṃ nappajānāmi, sammatto lakkhaṇūruyā''ti.. --

[03] ettha ^b^tuttaṃ^eb^ vuccati kaṇṇamūle vijjhanāyadaṇḍako. ^b^tomara^eb^nti pādādīsu vijjhanadaṇḍatomaraṃ. ^b^aṅkuso^eb^ti matthake vijjhanakuṭilakaṇṭako. yo ca nāgo pabhinnamatto accaṅkuso hoti, aṅkusaṃ atīto; aṅkusena vijjhiyamānopi vasaṃ na gacchati, so ``jitaṃ mayā tuttatomaraṃ, yo ahaṃ aṅkusassapi vasaṃ na gacchāmī''ti madadappena kiñci kāraṇaṃ na bujjhati. yathā so accaṅkuso nāgo ``jitaṃ me tuttatomara''nti kiñci kāraṇaṃ nappajānāti, evaṃ ahampi lakkhaṇasampannaūrutāya lakkhaṇūruyā sammatto matto pamatto ummatto viya kiñci kāraṇaṃ nappajānāmīti vadati. atha vā accaṅkusova nāgo ahampi sammatto lakkhaṇūruyā kiñci tato ^a^M2.0295^ea^ virāgakāraṇaṃ nappajānāmi. kasmā? yasmā tena nāgena viya jitaṃ me tuttatomaraṃ, na kassaci vadato vacanaṃ ādiyāmi.

[03] ^b^tayi gedhitacittosmī^eb^ti bhadde lakkhaṇūru tayi baddhacittosmi. ^b^gedhitacitto^eb^ti vā gedhaṃ ajjhupetacitto. ^b^cittaṃ vipariṇāmita^eb^nti pakatiṃ jahitvā ṭhitaṃ. ^b^paṭigantuṃ na sakkomī^eb^ti nivattituṃ na sakkomi. ^b^vaṅkaghastova ambujo^eb^ti baḷisaṃ gilitvā ṭhitamaccho viya. ``ghaso''tipi pāṭho, ayamevattho.

[03] ^b^vāmūrū^eb^ti vāmākārena saṇṭhitaūru, kadalikkhandhasadisaūrūti vā attho. ^b^sajā^eb^ti āliṅga. ^b^mandalocane^eb^ti itthiyo na tikhiṇaṃ nijjhāyanti mandaṃ ālocenti olokenti, tasmā ^a^V2.0265^ea^ ``mandalocanā''ti vuccanti. ^b^palissajā^eb^ti sabbatobhāgena āliṅga. ^b^etaṃ me abhipatthita^eb^nti etaṃ mayā abhiṇhaṃ patthitaṃ.

[03] ^b^appako vata me santo^eb^ti pakatiyāva mando samāno. ^b^vellitakesiyā^eb^ti kesā muñcitvā piṭṭhiyaṃ vissaṭṭhakāle sappo ^a^P3.0703^ea^ viya vellantā gacchantā assāti vellitakesī, tassā vellitakesiyā. ^b^anekabhāvo samuppādī^eb^ti anekavidho jāto. ^b^anekabhāgo^eb^ti vā pāṭho. ^b^arahanteva dakkhiṇā^eb^ti arahantamhi dinnadānaṃ viya nānappakārato pabhinno.
[03] ^b^yaṃ me atthi kataṃ puñña^eb^nti yaṃ mayā kataṃ puññamatthi. ^b^arahantesu tādisū^eb^ti tādilakkhaṇappattesu arahantesu. ^b^tayā saddhiṃ vipaccata^eb^nti sabbaṃ tayā saddhimeva vipākaṃ detu.

[03] ^b^ekodī^eb^ti ekībhāvaṃ gato. ^b^nipako sato^eb^ti nepakkaṃ vuccati paññā, tāya samannāgatoti nipako. satiyā samannāgatattā sato. ^b^amataṃ muni jigīsāno^eb^ti yathā so buddhamuni amataṃ nibbānaṃ jigīsati pariyesati, evaṃ taṃ ahaṃ sūriyavacchase jigīsāmi pariyesāmi. yathā vā so amataṃ jigīsāno esanto gavesanto vicarati, evāhaṃ taṃ esanto gavesanto vicarāmītipi attho.

[03] ^b^yathāpi muni nandeyya, patvā sambodhimuttama^eb^nti yathā buddhamuni bodhipallaṅke nisinno sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ patvā nandeyya toseyya. ^b^evaṃ nandeyya^eb^nti ^a^M2.0296^ea^ evameva ahampi tayā missībhāvaṃ gato nandeyyaṃ, pītisomanassajāto bhaveyyanti vadati.

[03] ^b^tāhaṃ bhadde vareyyāhe^eb^ti ^b^ahe^eb^ti āmantanaṃ, ahe bhadde sūriyavacchase, sakkena devānamindena ``kiṃ dvīsu devalokesu devarajjaṃ gaṇhasi, suriyavacchasa''nti, evaṃ vare dinne devarajjaṃ pahāya ``sūriyavacchasaṃ gaṇhāmī''ti evaṃ taṃ ahaṃ vareyyaṃ iccheyyaṃ gaṇheyyanti attho.

[03] ^b^sālaṃva na ciraṃ phulla^eb^nti tava pitu nagaradvāre naciraṃ pupphito sālo atthi. so ativiya manoharo. taṃ naciraṃ phullasālaṃ viya. ^b^pitaraṃ te sumedhase^eb^ti atisassirīkaṃ tava pitaraṃ ^b^vandamāno namassāmi^eb^ namo karomi. ^b^yassāsetādisī pajā^eb^ti yassa āsi etādisī dhītā.

[03] 349^b^.^eb^ ^b^saṃsandatī^eb^ti ^a^V2.0266^ea^ kasmā gītasaddassa ceva vīṇāsaddassa ^a^P3.0704^ea^ ca vaṇṇaṃ kathesi? kiṃ tattha bhagavato sārāgo atthīti? natthi. chaḷaṅgupekkhāya upekkhako bhagavā etādisesu ṭhānesu, kevalaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhaṃ jānāti, na tattha rajjati. vuttampi cetaṃ ``saṃvijjati kho, āvuso, bhagavato cakkhu, passati bhagavā cakkhunā rūpaṃ, chandarāgo bhagavato natthi, suvimuttacitto bhagavā. saṃvijjati kho, āvuso, bhagavato sota''ntiādi (saṃ0 ni0 4.232). sace pana vaṇṇaṃ na katheyya, pañcasikho ``okāso me kato''ti na jāneyya. atha sakko ``bhagavatā pañcasikhassa okāso na kato''ti devatā gahetvā tatova paṭinivatteyya, tato mahājāniyo bhaveyya. vaṇṇe pana kathite ``kato bhagavatā pañcasikhassa okāso''ti devatāhi saddhiṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchitvā vissajjanāvasāne asītiyā devatāsahassehi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahissatīti ñatvā vaṇṇaṃ kathesi.

[03] tattha ^b^kadā saṃyūḷhā^eb^ti kadā ganthitā piṇḍitā. ^b^tena kho panāhaṃ, bhante, samayenā^eb^ti tena samayena tasmiṃ tumhākaṃ sambodhippattito paṭṭhāya aṭṭhame sattāhe. ^b^bhaddā nāma sūriyavacchasā^eb^ti nāmato bhaddā sarīrasampattiyā sūriyavacchasā. ^b^bhaginī^eb^ti vohāravacanametaṃ, devadhītāti attho. ^b^parakāminī^eb^ti paraṃ kāmeti abhikaṅkhati.

[03] ^b^upanaccantiyā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0297^ea^ naccamānāya. sā kira ekasmiṃ samaye cātumahārājikadevehi saddhiṃ sakkassa devarājassa naccaṃ dassanatthāya gatā, tasmiñca khaṇe sakko tathāgatassa aṭṭha yathābhucce guṇe payirudāhāsi. evaṃ tasmiṃ divase gantvā naccantī assosi.

[03] 350^b^.^eb^ ^b^paṭisammodatī^eb^ti ``saṃsandati kho te''tiādīni vadanto bhagavā sammodati, pañcasikho paṭisammodati. gāthā ca bhāsanto pañcasikho sammodati, bhagavā paṭisammodati. ^b^āmantesī^eb^ti jānāpesi. tassa kirevaṃ ahosi ``ayaṃ pañcasikho mayā mama kammena pesito attano kammaṃ karoti. evarūpassa satthu santike ṭhatvā kāmaguṇūpasañhitaṃ ananucchavikaṃ kathesi, naṭā nāma nillajjā honti, kathento vippakārampi dasseyya, handa naṃ mama kammaṃ jānāpemī''ti cintetvā āmantesi.

[03] 351^b^.^eb^ ^b^evañca^eb^ ^a^P3.0705^ea^ ^a^V2.0267^ea^ ^b^pana tathāgatā^eb^ti dhammasaṅgāhakattherehi ṭhapitavacanaṃ. ^b^abhivadantī^eb^ti abhivādanasampaṭicchanena vaḍḍhitavacanena vadanti. ^b^abhivadito^eb^ti vaḍḍhitavacanena vutto.

[03] ^b^urundā samapādī^eb^ti mahantā vivaṭā ahosi, andhakāro guhāyaṃ antaradhāyi. ^b^āloko udapādī^eb^ti yo pakatiyā guhāyaṃ andhakāro, so antarahito, āloko jāto. sabbametaṃ dhammasaṅgāhakānaṃ vacanaṃ.

[03] 352^b^.^eb^ ^b^cirapaṭikāhaṃ, bhante^eb^ti cirato ahaṃ, cirato paṭṭhāyāhaṃ dassanakāmoti attho. ^b^kehici kehici kiccakaraṇīyehī^eb^ti devānaṃ dhītā ca puttā ca aṅke nibbattanti, pādaparicārikā itthiyo sayane nibbattanti, tāsaṃ maṇḍanapasādhanakārikā devatā sayanaṃ parivāretvā nibbattanti, veyyāvaccakarā antovimāne nibbattanti, etesaṃ atthāya aḍḍakaraṇaṃ nāma natthi. ye pana sīmantare nibbattanti, te ``tava santakā, mama santakā''ti nicchetuṃ asakkontā aḍḍaṃ karonti, sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ pucchanti. so ``yassa vimānaṃ āsannataraṃ, tassa santakā''ti vadati. sace ^a^M2.0298^ea^ dvepi samaṭṭhāne honti, ``yassa vimānaṃ olokentī ṭhitā, tassa santakā''ti vadati. sace ekampi na oloketi, taṃ ubhinnaṃ kalahupacchedanatthaṃ attano santakaṃ karoti. kīḷādīnipi kiccāni karaṇīyāneva. evarūpāni tāni karaṇīyāni sandhāya ``kehici kehici kiccakaraṇīyehī''ti āha.

[03] ^b^salaḷāgārake^eb^ti salaḷamayagandhakuṭiyaṃ. ^b^aññatarena samādhinā^eb^ti tadā kira bhagavā sakkasseva aparipākagataṃ ñāṇaṃ viditvā okāsaṃ akāretukāmo phalasamāpattivihārena nisīdi. taṃ esa ajānanto ``aññatarena samādhinā''ti āha. ^b^bhūjati ca nāmā^eb^ti ^b^bhūjatī^eb^ti tassā nāmaṃ. ^b^paricārikā^eb^ti pādaparicārikā devadhītā. sā kira dve phalāni pattā, tenassā devaloke abhiratiyeva natthi. niccaṃ bhagavato upaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā añjaliṃ sirasi ṭhapetvā bhagavantaṃ namassamānā tiṭṭhati. ^b^nemisaddena tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhito^eb^ti ``samāpanno saddaṃ suṇātī''ti no vata re vattabbe, nanu bhagavā sakkassa devānamindassa ^a^P3.0706^ea^ ``apicāhaṃ āyasmato cakkanemisaddena tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhito''ti bhaṇatīti. tiṭṭhatu nemisaddo, samāpanno nāma antosamāpattiyaṃ kaṇṇamūle dhamamānassa saṅkhayugaḷassāpi asanisannipātassāpi saddaṃ na suṇāti. bhagavā pana ``ettakaṃ kālaṃ sakkassa okāsaṃ na karissāmī''ti paricchinditvā kālavasena phalasamāpattiṃ samāpanno. sakko ``na dāni me satthā okāsaṃ karotī''ti gandhakuṭiṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā rathaṃ nivattetvā devalokābhimukhaṃ pesesi. gandhakuṭipariveṇaṃ ^a^V2.0268^ea^ rathasaddena samohitaṃ pañcaṅgikatūriyaṃ viya ahosi. bhagavato yathāparicchinnakālavasena samāpattito vuṭṭhitassa rathasaddeneva paṭhamāvajjanaṃ uppajji, tasmā evamāha.
