[03] apica satta dhammā passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti paṇītabhojanasevanatā utusukhasevanatā iriyāpathasukhasevanatā majjhattapayogatā sāraddhakāyapuggalaparivajjanatā passaddhakāyapuggalasevanatā tadadhimuttatāti. paṇītañhi siniddhaṃ sappāyabhojanaṃ bhuñjantassāpi, sītuṇhesu ^a^P3.0794^ea^ ca utūsu ṭhānādīsu ca iriyāpathesu sappāyautuñca iriyāpathañca sevantassāpi ^a^M2.0383^ea^ passaddhi uppajjati. yo pana mahāpurisajātiko sabbautuiriyāpathakkhamo hoti, na taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. yassa sabhāgavisabhāgatā atthi, tasseva visabhāge utuiriyāpathe vajjetvā sabhāge sevantassa uppajjati. majjhattapayogo vuccati attano ca parassa ca kammassakatāpaccavekkhaṇā. iminā majjhattapayogena uppajjati. yo leḍḍudaṇḍādīhi paraṃ viheṭhayamāno vicarati, evarūpaṃ sāraddhakāyaṃ puggalaṃ parivajjantassāpi, saṃyatapādapāṇiṃ passaddhakāyaṃ puggalaṃ sevantassāpi, ṭhānanisajjādīsu passaddhiuppādanatthāya ninnapoṇapabbhāracittassāpi ^a^V2.0345^ea^ uppajjati. evaṃ uppannassa panassa arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūri hotīti pajānāti.

[03] ^b^samādhisambojjhaṅgassa^eb^ ``atthi, bhikkhave, samathanimittaṃ abyagganimittaṃ, tattha yonisomanasikārabahulīkāro, ayamāhāro, anuppannassa vā samādhisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā samādhisambojjhaṅgassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṃvattatī''ti evaṃ uppādo hoti. tattha samathova samathanimittaṃ avikkhepaṭṭhena ca abyagganimittanti.

[03] apica ekādasa dhammā samādhisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti vatthuvisadakiriyatā indriyasamattapaṭipādanatā nimittakusalatā samaye cittassa paggaṇhanatā samaye cittassa niggaṇhanatā samaye sampahaṃsanatā samaye ajjhupekkhanatā asamāhitapuggalaparivajjanatā samāhitapuggalasevanatā jhānavimokkhapaccavekkhaṇatā tadadhimuttatāti. tattha ^b^vatthuvisadakiriyatā^eb^ ca ^b^indriyasamattapaṭipādanatā^eb^ ca vuttanayeneva veditabbā.

[03] ^b^nimittakusalatā^eb^ nāma kasiṇanimittassa uggahaṇakusalatā. ^b^samaye cittassa paggaṇhanatā^eb^ti yasmiṃ samaye atisithilavīriyatādīhi līnaṃ cittaṃ hoti, tasmiṃ samaye dhammavicayavīriyapītisambojjhaṅgasamuṭṭhāpanena tassa paggaṇhanaṃ. ^b^samaye cittassa paggaṇhanatā^eb^ti yasmiṃ samaye āraddhavīriyatādīhi uddhataṃ ^a^P3.0795^ea^ cittaṃ hoti, tasmiṃ samaye passaddhisamādhiupekkhāsambojjhaṅgasamuṭṭhāpanena tassa niggaṇhanaṃ. ^b^samaye sampahaṃsanatā^eb^ti yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ paññāpayogamandatāya vā upasamasukhānadhigamena vā nirassādaṃ hoti, tasmiṃ samaye aṭṭhasaṃvegavatthupaccavekkhaṇena saṃvejeti ^a^M2.0384^ea^. ^b^aṭṭha saṃvegavatthūni^eb^ nāma jāti jarā byādhi maraṇāni cattāri, apāyadukkhaṃ pañcamaṃ, atīte vaṭṭamūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ, anāgate vaṭṭamūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ, paccuppanne āhārapariyeṭṭhimūlakaṃ dukkhanti. ratanattayaguṇānussaraṇena ca pasādaṃ janeti, ayaṃ vuccati ``samaye sampahaṃsanatā''ti.

[03] ^b^samaye ajjhupekkhanatā^eb^ nāma yasmiṃ samaye sammāpaṭipattiṃ āgamma alīnaṃ anuddhataṃ anirassādaṃ ārammaṇe samappavattaṃ samathavīthipaṭipannaṃ cittaṃ hoti, tadāssa paggahaniggahasampahaṃsanesu na byāpāraṃ āpajjati, sārathi viya samappavattesu assesu. ayaṃ vuccati -- ``samaye ajjhupekkhanatā''ti. ^b^asamāhitapuggalaparivajjanatā^eb^ nāma upacāraṃ vā appanaṃ ^a^V2.0346^ea^ vā appattānaṃ vikkhittacittānaṃ puggalānaṃ ārakā parivajjanaṃ. ^b^samāhitapuggalasevanā^eb^ nāma upacārena vā appanāya vā samāhitacittānaṃ sevanā bhajanā payirupāsanā. ^b^tadadhimuttatā^eb^ nāma ṭhānanisajjādīsu samādhiuppādanatthaṃyeva ninnapoṇapabbhāracittatā. evañhi paṭipajjato esa uppajjati. evaṃ uppannassa panassa arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūri hotīti pajānāti.

[03] ^b^upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa^eb^ ``atthi, bhikkhave, upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṭṭhānīyā dhammā, tattha yonisomanasikārabahulīkāro, ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṃvattatī''ti evaṃ uppādo hoti. tattha upekkhāva upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṭṭhānīyā dhammā nāma.

[03] apica pañca dhammā upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti sattamajjhattatā saṅkhāramajjhattatā sattasaṅkhārakelāyanapuggalaparivajjanatā ^a^P3.0796^ea^ sattasaṅkhāramajjhattapuggalasevanatā tadadhimuttatāti. tattha dvīhākārehi ^b^sattamajjhattataṃ^eb^ samuṭṭhāpeti ``tvaṃ attano kammena āgantvā attanova kammena gamissasi, esopi attanova kammena āgantvā attanova kammena gamissati, tvaṃ kaṃ kelāyasī''ti evaṃ kammassakatāpaccavekkhaṇena, ``paramatthato sattoyeva natthi, so tvaṃ kaṃ kelāyasī''ti evaṃ nissattapaccavekkhaṇena cāti. dvīhevākārehi ^b^saṅkhāramajjhattataṃ^eb^ samuṭṭhāpeti -- ``idaṃ cīvaraṃ anupubbena vaṇṇavikāratañceva jiṇṇabhāvañca upagantvā pādapuñchanacoḷakaṃ hutvā yaṭṭhikoṭiyā chaḍḍanīyaṃ bhavissati, sace panassa sāmiko ^a^M2.0385^ea^ bhaveyya, nāssa evaṃ vinassituṃ dadeyyā''ti evaṃ assāmikabhāvapaccavekkhaṇena ca, ``anaddhaniyaṃ idaṃ tāvakālika''nti evaṃ tāvakālikabhāvapaccavekkhaṇena cāti. yathā ca cīvare, evaṃ pattādīsupi yojanā kātabbā.

[03] ^b^sattasaṅkhārakelāyanapuggalaparivajjanatā^eb^ti ettha yo puggalo gihi vā attano puttadhītādike, pabbajito vā attano antevāsikasamānupajjhāyakādike mamāyati, sahattheneva nesaṃ kesacchedanasūcikammacīvaradhovanarajanapattapacanādīni karoti, muhuttampi apassanto ``asuko sāmaṇero kuhiṃ asuko daharo kuhi''nti bhantamigo viya ito cito ca oloketi, aññena kesacchedanādīnaṃ atthāya ``muhuttaṃ asukaṃ pesethā''ti yāciyamānopi ``amhepi taṃ attano kammaṃ na kārema, tumhe naṃ gahetvā kilamessathā''ti na deti, ayaṃ sattakelāyano nāma.

[03] yo ^a^V2.0347^ea^ pana cīvarapattathālakakattarayaṭṭhiādīni mamāyati, aññassa hatthena parāmasitumpi na deti, tāvakālikaṃ yācito ``mayampi idaṃ mamāyantā na paribhuñjāma, tumhākaṃ kiṃ dassāmā''ti vadati, ayaṃ ^b^saṅkhārakelāyano^eb^ nāma. yo pana tesu dvīsupi vatthūsu majjhatto udāsino, ayaṃ ^b^sattasaṅkhāramajjhatto^eb^ nāma. iti ayaṃ upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo evarūpaṃ sattasaṅkhārakelāyanapuggalaṃ ārakā parivajjantassāpi, sattasaṅkhāramajjhattapuggalaṃ sevantassāpi, ṭhānanisajjādīsu taduppādanatthaṃ ninnapoṇapabbhāracittassāpi ^a^P3.0797^ea^ uppajjati. evaṃ uppannassa panassa arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūri hotīti pajānāti.

[03] ^b^iti ajjhattaṃ vā^eb^ti evaṃ attano vā satta sambojjhaṅge pariggaṇhitvā, parassa vā, kālena vā attano, kālena vā parassa sambojjhaṅge pariggaṇhitvā dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati. samudayavayā panettha sambojjhaṅgānaṃ nibbattinirodhavasena veditabbā. ito paraṃ vuttanayameva. kevalañhi idha bojjhaṅgapariggāhikā sati dukkhasaccanti evaṃ yojanaṃ katvā bojjhaṅgapariggāhakassa bhikkhuno niyyānamukhaṃ veditabbaṃ. sesaṃ tādisamevāti.
[06] bojjhaṅgapabbaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 386^b^.^eb^ evaṃ ^a^M2.0386^ea^ sattabojjhaṅgavasena dhammānupassanaṃ vibhajitvā idāni catusaccavasena vibhajituṃ ^b^puna capara^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha ^b^idaṃ dukkhanti yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī^eb^ti ṭhapetvā taṇhaṃ tebhūmakadhamme ``idaṃ dukkha''nti yathāsabhāvato pajānāti, tasseva kho pana dukkhassa janikaṃ samuṭṭhāpikaṃ purimataṇhaṃ ``ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo''ti, ubhinnaṃ appavattinibbānaṃ ``ayaṃ dukkhanirodho''ti, dukkhaparijānanaṃ samudayapajahanaṃ nirodhasacchikaraṇaṃ ariyamaggaṃ ``ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭipadā''ti yathāsabhāvato pajānātīti attho. avasesā ariyasaccakathā ṭhapetvā jātiādīnaṃ padabhājanakathaṃ visuddhimagge vitthāritāyeva.

[03] 388^b^.^eb^ padabhājane ^a^V2.0348^ea^ pana ^b^katamā ca, bhikkhave, jātī^eb^ti bhikkhave, yā jātipi dukkhāti evaṃ vuttā jāti, sā katamāti evaṃ sabbapucchāsu attho veditabbo. ^b^yā tesaṃ tesaṃ sattāna^eb^nti idaṃ ``imesaṃ nāmā''ti niyamābhāvato sabbasattānaṃ pariyādānavacanaṃ. ^b^tamhi tamhi sattanikāye^eb^ti idampi sabbasattanikāyapariyādānavacanaṃ jananaṃ ^b^jāti^eb^ savikārānaṃ paṭhamābhinibbattakkhandhānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. ^b^sañjātī^eb^ti idaṃ tassā eva upasaggamaṇḍitavevacanaṃ. sā eva anupaviṭṭhākārena okkamanaṭṭhena ^b^okkanti.^eb^ nibbattisaṅkhātena abhinibbattanaṭṭhena ^b^abhinibbatti.^eb^ iti ayaṃ catubbidhāpi sammutikathā nāma ^a^P3.0798^ea^. ^b^khandhānaṃ pātubhāvo^eb^ti ayaṃ pana paramatthakathā. ekavokārabhavādīsu ekacatupañcabhedānaṃ khandhānaṃyeva pātubhāvo, na puggalassa, tasmiṃ pana sati puggalo pātubhūtoti vohāramattaṃ hoti. ^b^āyatanānaṃ paṭilābho^eb^ti āyatanāni pātubhavantāneva paṭiladdhāni nāma honti, so tesaṃ pātubhāvasaṅkhāto paṭilābhoti attho.

[03] 389^b^.^eb^ ^b^jarā^eb^ti sabhāvaniddeso. ^b^jīraṇatā^eb^ti ākārabhāvaniddeso. ^b^khaṇḍicca^eb^ntiādi vikāraniddeso. daharakālasmiñhi dantā samasetā honti. teyeva paripaccante anukkamena vaṇṇavikāraṃ āpajjitvā tattha tattha pattanti. atha patitañca ṭhitañca upādāya khaṇḍitadantā khaṇḍitā ^a^M2.0387^ea^ nāma. khaṇḍitānaṃ bhāvo ^b^khaṇḍicca^eb^nti vuccati. anukkamena paṇḍarabhūtāni kesalomāni palitāni nāma. palitāni sañjātāni assāti palito, palitassa bhāvo ^b^pāliccaṃ.^eb^ jarāvātappahārena sositamaṃsalohitatāya valiyo tacasmiṃ assāti valittaco, tassa bhāvo ^b^valittacatā.^eb^ ettāvatā dantakesalomatacesu vikāradassanavasena pākaṭībhūtā pākaṭajarā dassitā.

[03] yatheva hi udakassa vā vātassa vā aggino vā tiṇarukkhādīnaṃ saṃbhaggapalibhaggatāya vā jhāmatāya vā gatamaggo pākaṭo hoti, na ca so gatamaggo tāneva udakādīni, evameva jarāya dantādīnaṃ khaṇḍiccādivasena gatamaggo pākaṭo, cakkhuṃ ummiletvāpi gayhati, na ca khaṇḍiccādīneva jarā. na hi jarā cakkhuviññeyyā hoti. yasmā pana jaraṃ pattassa āyu hāyati, tasmā jarā ``āyuno saṃhānī''ti phalūpacārena vuttā. yasmā daharakāle suppasannāni sukhumampi attano visayaṃ sukheneva ca gaṇhanasamatthāni cakkhādīni indriyāni jaraṃ pattassa paripakkāni ālulitāni avisadāni oḷārikampi attano visayaṃ gahetuṃ asamatthāni honti, tasmā ``indriyānaṃ paripāko''tipi phalūpacāreneva vuttā.

[03] 390^b^.^eb^ maraṇaniddese ^a^V2.0349^ea^ ^b^ya^eb^nti maraṇaṃ sandhāya napuṃsakaniddeso, yaṃ maraṇaṃ cutīti vuccati, cavanatāti vuccatīti ayamettha yojanā. tattha ^b^cutī^eb^ti sabhāvaniddeso. ^b^cavanatā^eb^ti ākārabhāvaniddeso. maraṇaṃ pattassa khandhā bhijjanti ceva antaradhāyanti ca adassanaṃ gacchanti, tasmā taṃ ^b^bhedo antaradhāna^eb^nti vuccati. ^b^maccumaraṇa^eb^nti maccumaraṇaṃ, na khaṇikamaraṇaṃ. ^b^kālakiriyā^eb^ti maraṇakālakiriyā. ayaṃ sabbāpi sammutikathāva. ^b^khandhānaṃ bhedo^eb^ti ayaṃ pana paramatthakathā. ekavokārabhavādīsu ekacatupañcabhedānaṃ khandhānaṃyeva bhedo, na ^a^P3.0799^ea^ puggalassa, tasmiṃ pana sati puggalo matoti vohāramattaṃ hoti.

[03] ^b^kaḷevarassa nikkhepo^eb^ti attabhāvassa nikkhepo. maraṇaṃ pattassa hi niratthaṃva kaliṅgaraṃ attabhāvo patati, tasmā taṃ kaḷevarassa nikkhepoti vuttaṃ. jīvitindriyassa upacchedo pana sabbākārato paramatthato maraṇaṃ. etadeva ^a^M2.0388^ea^ sammutimaraṇanti pi vuccati. jīvitindriyupacchedameva hi gahetvā lokiyā ``tisso mato, phusso mato''ti vadanti.

[03] 391^b^.^eb^ ^b^byasanenā^eb^ti ñātibyasanādīsu yena kenaci byasanena. ^b^dukkhadhammenā^eb^ti vadhabandhādinā dukkhakāraṇena. ^b^phuṭṭhassā^eb^ti ajjhotthaṭassa abhibhūtassa. ^b^soko^eb^ti yo ñātibyasanādīsu vā vadhabandhanādīsu vā aññatarasmiṃ sati tena abhibhūtassa uppajjati socanalakkhaṇo soko. ^b^socitatta^eb^nti socitabhāvo. yasmā panesa abbhantare sosento parisosento uppajjati, tasmā ^b^antosoko antoparisoko^eb^ti vuccati.

[03] 392^b^.^eb^ ``mayhaṃ dhītā, mayhaṃ putto''ti evaṃ ādissa ādissa devanti paridevanti etenāti ^b^ādevo.^eb^ taṃ taṃ vaṇṇaṃ parikittetvā devanti etenāti ^b^paridevo.^eb^ tato parā dve tasseva bhāvaniddesā.

[03] 393^b^.^eb^ ^b^kāyika^eb^nti kāyapasādavatthukaṃ. dukkhamanaṭṭhena ^b^dukkhaṃ. asāta^eb^nti amadhuraṃ. ^b^kāyasamphassajaṃ dukkha^eb^nti kāyasamphassato jātaṃ dukkhaṃ. ^b^asātaṃ vedayita^eb^nti amadhuraṃ vedayitaṃ.
[03] 394^b^.^eb^ ^b^cetasika^eb^nti cittasampayuttaṃ. sesaṃ dukkhe vuttanayameva.
[03] 395^b^.^eb^ ^b^āyāso^eb^ti saṃsīdanavisīdanākārappatto cittakilamatho. balavataraṃ āyāso ^b^upāyāso.^eb^ tato parā dve attattaniyābhāvadīpakā bhāvaniddesā.

[03] 398^b^.^eb^ ^b^jātidhammāna^eb^nti ^a^V2.0350^ea^ jātisabhāvānaṃ. ^b^icchā uppajjatī^eb^ti taṇhā uppajjati. ^b^aho vatā^eb^ti patthanā. ^b^na kho panetaṃ icchāyā^eb^ti evaṃ jātiyā anāgamanaṃ vinā maggabhāvanaṃ na icchāya pattabbaṃ. ^b^idampī^eb^ti etampi upari sesāni upādāya pikāro. ^b^yampiccha^eb^nti yenapi dhammena alabbhaneyyavatthuṃ icchanto na labhati, taṃ alabbhaneyya vatthumhi icchanaṃ dukkhaṃ. esa nayo sabbattha.
[03] 399^b^.^eb^ khandhaniddese ^a^M2.0389^ea^ rūpañca taṃ upādānakkhandho cāti ^b^rūpupādānakkhandho^eb^ evaṃ sabbattha.

[03] 400^b^.^eb^ ^b^yāyaṃ taṇhā^eb^ti yā ayaṃ taṇhā. ^b^ponobbhavikā^eb^ti punabbhavakaraṇaṃ punobbhavo, punobbhavo sīlaṃ assāti ^b^ponobbhavikā.^eb^ nandīrāgena saha gatāti ^b^nandīrāgasahagatā.^eb^ nandīrāgena saddhiṃ atthato ekattameva gatāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^tatratatrābhinandinī^eb^ti ^a^P3.0800^ea^ yatra yatra attabhāvo, tatra tatra abhinandinī. rūpādīsu vā ārammaṇesu tatra tatra abhinandinī, rūpābhinandinī sadda, gandha, rasa, phoṭṭhabba, dhammābhinandinīti attho. ^b^seyyathida^eb^nti nipāto. tassa sā katamā ceti attho. kāme taṇhā ^b^kāmataṇhā,^eb^ pañcakāmaguṇikarāgassetaṃ nāmaṃ. bhave taṇhā ^b^bhavataṇhā,^eb^ bhavapatthanāvasena uppannassa sassatadiṭṭhisahagatassa rūpārūpabhavarāgassa ca jhānanikantiyā cetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. vibhave taṇhā ^b^vibhavataṇhā,^eb^ ucchedadiṭṭhisahagatarāgassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.

[03] idāni tassā taṇhāya vatthuṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ ^b^sā kho panesā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^uppajjatī^eb^ti jāyati. ^b^nivisatī^eb^ti punappunaṃ pavattivasena patiṭṭhahati. ^b^yaṃ loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpa^eb^nti yaṃ lokasmiṃ piyasabhāvañceva madhurasabhāvañca. ^b^cakkhu loke^eb^tiādīsu lokasmiñhi cakkhādīsu mamattena abhiniviṭṭhā sattā sampattiyaṃ patiṭṭhitā attano cakkhuṃ ādāsatalādīsu nimittaggahaṇānusārena vippasannaṃ pañcapasādaṃ suvaṇṇavimāne ugghāṭitamaṇisīhapañjaraṃ viya maññanti, sotaṃ rajatapanāḷikaṃ viya, pāmaṅgasuttaṃ viya ca maññanti, ``tuṅganāsā''ti laddhavohāraṃ ghānaṃ vaṭṭitvā ṭhapitaharitālavaṭṭaṃ viya maññanti, jivhaṃ rattakambalapaṭalaṃ viya mudusiniddhamadhurasadaṃ maññanti, kāyaṃ sālalaṭṭhiṃ viya, suvaṇṇatoraṇaṃ viya ca maññanti, manaṃ aññesaṃ manena asadisaṃ uḷāraṃ maññanti. rūpaṃ suvaṇṇakaṇikārapupphādivaṇṇaṃ viya, saddaṃ mattakaravīka kokilamandadhamitamaṇivaṃsanigghosaṃ viya, attanā paṭiladdhāni catusamuṭṭhānikagandhārammaṇādīni ^a^V2.0351^ea^ ``kassaññassa evarūpāni atthī''ti maññanti. tesaṃ evaṃ maññamānānaṃ tāni cakkhādīni piyarūpāni ceva sātarūpāni ca honti. atha nesaṃ tattha anuppannā ceva taṇhā uppajjati ^a^M2.0390^ea^, uppannā ca taṇhā punappunaṃ pavattivasena nivisati. tasmā bhagavā ``cakkhu loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ, etthesā taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjatī''tiādimāha. tattha ^b^uppajjamānā^eb^ti yadā uppajjamānā hoti, tadā ettha uppajjatīti attho. esa nayo sabbattha.

[03] 401^b^.^eb^ ^b^asesavirāganirodho^eb^tiādīni sabbāni nibbānavevacanāneva. nibbānañhi āgamma taṇhā asesā virajjati nirujjhati, tasmā taṃ ``tassāyeva taṇhāya asesavirāganirodho''ti vuccati. nibbānañca āgamma taṇhā cajiyati paṭinissajjiyati vimuccati na ^a^P3.0801^ea^ allīyati, tasmā nibbānaṃ ``cāgo paṭinissaggo mutti anālayo''ti vuccati. ekameva hi nibbānaṃ, nāmāni panassa sabbasaṅkhatānaṃ nāmapaṭipakkhavasena anekāni honti. seyyathidaṃ, asesavirāgo asesanirodho cāgo paṭinissaggo mutti anālayo rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo taṇhakkhayo anuppādo appavattaṃ animittaṃ appaṇihitaṃ anāyūhanaṃ appaṭisandhi anupapatti agati ajātaṃ ajaraṃ abyādhi amataṃ asokaṃ aparidevaṃ anupāyāsaṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhanti.

[03] idāni maggena chinnāya nibbānaṃ āgamma appavattipattāyapi ca taṇhāya yesu vatthūsu tassā uppatti dassitā, tattheva abhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^sā kho panesā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha yathā puriso khette jātaṃ tittālābuvalliṃ disvā aggato paṭṭhāya mūlaṃ pariyesitvā chindeyya, sā anupubbena milāyitvā apaññattiṃ gaccheyya. tato tasmiṃ khette tittālābu niruddhā pahīnāti vucceyya, evameva khette tittālābu viya cakkhādīsu taṇhā. sā ariyamaggena mūlacchinnā nibbānaṃ āgamma appavattiṃ gacchati. evaṃ gatā pana tesu vatthūsu khette tittālābu viya na paññāyati.

[03] yathā ca aṭavito core ānetvā nagarassa dakkhiṇadvāre ghāteyyuṃ, tato aṭaviyaṃ corā matāti vā māritāti vā vucceyyuṃ, evaṃ aṭaviyaṃ corā viya cakkhādīsu taṇhā. sā dakkhiṇadvāre corā viya nibbānaṃ āgamma niruddhattā nibbāne niruddhā. evaṃ niruddhā panetesu ^a^V2.0352^ea^ vatthūsu aṭaviyaṃ corā viya na paññāyati, tenassā tattheva nirodhaṃ dassento ^a^M2.0391^ea^ ``cakkhu loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ, etthesā taṇhā pahīyamānā pahīyati, ettha nirujjhamānā nirujjhatī''tiādimāha.

[03] 402^b^.^eb^ ^b^ayamevā^eb^ti aññamaggapaṭikkhepanatthaṃ niyamanaṃ. ^b^ariyo^eb^ti taṃ taṃ maggavajjhehi kilesehi ārakattā ariyabhāvakarattā ca ariyo. ^b^dukkhe ñāṇa^eb^ntiādinā catusaccakammaṭṭhānaṃ dassitaṃ. tattha purimāni dve saccāni vaṭṭaṃ, pacchimāni vivaṭṭaṃ. tesu bhikkhuno vaṭṭe kammaṭṭhānābhiniveso hoti, vivaṭṭe natthi abhiniveso. purimāni hi dve saccāni ``pañcakkhandhā dukkhaṃ, taṇhā samudayo''ti evaṃ saṅkhepena ca ``katame pañcakkhandhā, rūpakkhandho''tiādinā nayena vitthārena ca ācariyassa santike uggaṇhitvā vācāya punappunaṃ parivattento yogāvacaro kammaṃ karoti. itaresu pana dvīsu saccesu nirodhasaccaṃ iṭṭhaṃ kantaṃ manāpaṃ, maggasaccaṃ iṭṭhaṃ kantaṃ manāpanti evaṃ savanena kammaṃ ^a^P3.0802^ea^ karoti. so evaṃ karonto cattāri saccāni ekapaṭivedheneva paṭivijjhati ekābhisamayena abhisameti. dukkhaṃ pariññāpaṭivedhena paṭivijjhati, samudayaṃ pahānapaṭivedhena, nirodhaṃ sacchikiriyāpaṭivedhena, maggaṃ bhāvanāpaṭivedhena paṭivijjhati. dukkhaṃ pariññābhisamayena...pe0... maggaṃ bhāvanābhisamayena abhisameti. evamassa pubbabhāge dvīsu saccesu uggahaparipucchāsavanadhāraṇasammasanapaṭivedho hoti, dvīsu pana savanapaṭivedhoyeva. aparabhāge tīsu kiccato paṭivedho hoti, nirodhe ārammaṇapaṭivedho. paccavekkhaṇā pana pattasaccassa hoti. ayañca ādikammiko, tasmā sā idha na vuttā.

[03] imassa ca bhikkhuno pubbe pariggahato ``dukkhaṃ parijānāmi, samudayaṃ pajahāmi, nirodhaṃ sacchikaromi, maggaṃ bhāvemī''ti ābhogasamannāhāramanasikārapaccavekkhaṇā natthi, pariggahato paṭṭhāya hoti. aparabhāge pana dukkhaṃ pariññātameva...pe0... maggo bhāvitova hoti. tattha dve saccāni duddasattā gambhīrāni, dve gambhīrattā duddasāni. dukkhasaccañhi uppattito pākaṭaṃ, khāṇukaṇṭakapahārādīsu ``aho dukkha''nti vattabbatampi āpajjati. samudayampi khāditukāmatābhuñjitukāmatādivasena uppattito pākaṭaṃ. lakkhaṇapaṭivedhato pana ubhayampi gambhīraṃ. iti tāni duddasattā gambhīrāni. itaresaṃ pana dvinnaṃ dassanatthāya payogo bhavaggagahaṇatthaṃ hatthappasāraṇaṃ ^a^M2.0392^ea^ viya avīciphusanatthaṃ pādappasāraṇaṃ viya satadhā bhinnassa vālassa koṭiyā ^a^V2.0353^ea^ koṭipādanaṃ viya ca hoti. iti tāni gambhīrattā duddasāni. evaṃ duddasattā gambhīresu gambhīrattā ca duddasesu catūsu saccesu uggahādivasena pubbabhāgañāṇuppattiṃ sandhāya idaṃ ^b^dukkhe ñāṇa^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. paṭivedhakkhaṇe pana ekameva taṃ ñāṇaṃ hoti.

[03] nekkhammasaṅkappādayo kāmabyāpādavihiṃsāviramaṇasaññānaṃ nānattā pubbabhāge nānā, maggakkhaṇe pana imesu tīsu ṭhānesu uppannassa akusalasaṅkappassa padapacchedato anuppattisādhanavasena maggaṅgaṃ pūrayamāno ekova kusalasaṅkappo uppajjati. ayaṃ ^b^sammāsaṅkappo^eb^ nāma.

[03] musāvādāveramaṇiādayopi musāvādādīhi viramaṇasaññānaṃ nānattā pubbabhāge nānā, maggakkhaṇe pana imesu catūsu ṭhānesu uppannāya akusaladussīlyacetanāya padapacchedato anuppattisādhanavasena maggaṅgaṃ pūrayamānā ekāva kusalaveramaṇī uppajjati. ayaṃ ^b^sammāvācā^eb^ nāma ^a^P3.0803^ea^.

[03] pāṇātipātāveramaṇiādayopi pāṇātipātādīhi viramaṇasaññānaṃ nānattā pubbabhāge nānā, maggakkhaṇe pana imesu tīsu ṭhānesu uppannāya akusaladussīlyacetanāya akiriyato padapacchedato anuppattisādhanavasena maggaṅgaṃ pūrayamānā ekāva kusalaveramaṇī uppajjati, ayaṃ ^b^sammākammanto^eb^ nāma.

[03] ^b^micchāājīva^eb^nti khādanīyabhojanīyādīnaṃ atthāya pavattitaṃ kāyavacīduccaritaṃ. ^b^pahāyā^eb^ti vajjetvā. ^b^sammāājīvenā^eb^ti buddhapasatthena ājīvena. ^b^jīvitaṃ kappetī^eb^ti jīvitappavattiṃ pavatteti. sammāājīvopi kuhanādīhi viramaṇasaññānaṃ nānattā pubbabhāge nānā, maggakkhaṇe pana imesuyeva sattasu ṭhānesu uppannāya micchājīvadussīlyacetanāya padapacchedato anuppattisādhanavasena maggaṅgaṃ pūrayamānā ekāva kusalaveramaṇī uppajjati, ayaṃ ^b^sammāājīvo^eb^ nāma.

[03] ^b^anuppannāna^eb^nti ekasmiṃ vā bhave tathārūpe vā ārammaṇe attano na uppannānaṃ. parassa pana uppajjamāne disvā ``aho vata me evarūpā pāpakā akusaladhammā na uppajjeyyu''nti evaṃ anuppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ ^a^M2.0393^ea^ dhammānaṃ anuppādāya. ^b^chandaṃ janetī^eb^ti tesaṃ anuppādakapaṭipattisādhakaṃ vīriyachandaṃ janeti. ^b^vāyamatī^eb^ti vāyāmaṃ karoti. ^b^vīriyaṃ ārabhatī^eb^ti ^a^V2.0354^ea^ vīriyaṃ pavatteti. ^b^cittaṃ paggaṇhātī^eb^ti vīriyena cittaṃ paggahitaṃ karoti. ^b^padahatī^eb^ti kāmaṃ taco ca nhāru ca aṭṭhi ca avasissatūti padahanaṃ pavatteti.

[03] ^b^uppannāna^eb^nti samudācāravasena attano uppannapubbānaṃ. idāni tādise na uppādessāmīti tesaṃ pahānāya chandaṃ janeti. ^b^anuppannānaṃ kusalāna^eb^nti appaṭiladdhānaṃ paṭhamajjhānādīnaṃ. ^b^uppannāna^eb^nti tesaṃyeva paṭiladdhānaṃ. ^b^ṭhitiyā^eb^ti punappunaṃ uppattipabandhavasena ṭhitatthaṃ. ^b^asammosāyā^eb^ti avināsanatthaṃ. ^b^bhiyyobhāvāyā^eb^ti uparibhāvāya. ^b^vepullāyā^eb^ti vipulabhāvāya. ^b^bhāvanāya pāripūriyā^eb^ti bhāvanāya paripūraṇatthaṃ. ayampi sammāvāyāmo anuppannānaṃ akusalānaṃ anuppādanādicittānaṃ nānattā pubbabhāge nānā, maggakkhaṇe pana imesuyeva catūsu ṭhānesu kiccasādhanavasena maggaṅgaṃ pūrayamānaṃ ekameva kusalavīriyaṃ uppajjati. ayaṃ ^b^sammāvāyāmo^eb^ nāma.
[03] sammāsatipi kāyādipariggāhakacittānaṃ nānattā pubbabhāge nānā, maggakkhaṇe pana catūsu ṭhānesu kiccasādhanavasena maggaṅgaṃ pūrayamānā ekāva sati uppajjati. ayaṃ ^b^sammāsati^eb^ nāma.

[03] jhānāni pubbabhāgepi maggakkhaṇepi ^a^P3.0804^ea^ nānā, pubbabhāge samāpattivasena nānā, maggakkhaṇe nānāmaggavasena. ekassa hi paṭhamamaggo paṭhamajjhāniko hoti, dutiyamaggādayopi paṭhamajjhānikā vā dutiyajjhānādīsu aññatarajhānikā vā. ekassapi paṭhamamaggo dutiyādīnaṃ aññatarajhāniko hoti, dutiyādayopi dutiyādīnaṃ aññatarajjhānikā vā paṭhamajjhānikā vā. evaṃ cattāropi maggā jhānavasena sadisā vā asadisā vā ekaccasadisā vā honti. ayaṃ panassa viseso pādakajjhānaniyamena hoti.

[03] pādakajjhānaniyamena tāva paṭhamajjhānalābhino paṭhamajjhānā vuṭṭhāya vipassantassa uppanno maggo paṭhamajjhāniko hoti. maggaṅgabojjhaṅgāni panettha paripuṇṇāneva honti. dutiyajjhānato vuṭṭhāya vipassantassa uppanno dutiyajjhāniko hoti. maggaṅgāni panettha satta honti. tatiyajjhānato vuṭṭhāya vipassantassa uppanno tatiyajjhāniko. maggaṅgāni panettha satta ^a^M2.0394^ea^, bojjhaṅgāni cha honti. esa nayo catutthajjhānato vuṭṭhāya yāva nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ.

[03] āruppe ^a^V2.0355^ea^ catukkapañcakajjhānaṃ uppajjati, tañca lokuttaraṃ, no lokiyanti vuttaṃ, ettha kathanti? etthāpi paṭhamajjhānādīsu yato vuṭṭhāya sotāpattimaggaṃ paṭilabhitvā arūpasamāpattiṃ bhāvetvā so āruppe uppanno, taṃ jhānikāvassa tattha tayo maggā uppajjanti. evaṃ pādakajjhānameva niyameti.

[03] keci pana therā ``vipassanāya ārammaṇabhūtā khandhā niyamentī''ti vadanti. keci ``puggalajjhāsayo niyametī''ti vadanti. keci ``vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā niyametī''ti vadanti. tesaṃ vādavinicchayo visuddhimagge vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanādhikāre vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
[03] ^b^ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, sammāsamādhī^eb^ti ayaṃ pubbabhāge lokiyo aparabhāge lokuttaro sammāsamādhīti vuccati.

[03] ^b^iti ajjhattaṃ vā^eb^ti evaṃ attano vā cattāri saccāni pariggaṇhitvā, parassa vā, kālena vā attano, kālena vā parassa cattāri saccāni pariggaṇhitvā dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati. samudayavayā panettha catunnaṃ saccānaṃ yathāsambhāvato uppattinivattivasena veditabbā. ito paraṃ vuttanayameva. kevalañhi idha catusaccapariggāhikā sati dukkhasaccanti evaṃ ^a^P3.0805^ea^ yojanaṃ katvā saccapariggāhakassa bhikkhuno niyyānamukhaṃ veditabbaṃ, sesaṃ tādisamevāti.
[06] catusaccapabbaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 404^b^.^eb^ ettāvatā ānāpānapabbaṃ catuiriyāpathapabbaṃ catusampajaññapabbaṃ dvattiṃsākāraṃ catudhātuvavatthānaṃ navasivathikā vedanānupassanā cittānupassanā nīvaraṇapariggaho khandhapariggaho āyatanapariggaho bojjhaṅgapariggaho saccapariggahoti ekavīsati kammaṭṭhānāni. tesu ānāpānaṃ dvattiṃsākāraṃ navasivathikāti ekādasa appanākammaṭṭhānāni honti. dīghabhāṇakamahāsīvatthero pana ``navasivathikā ādīnavānupassanāvasena vuttā''ti āha. tasmā tassa matena dveyeva appanākammaṭṭhānāni, sesāni upacārakammaṭṭhānāni. kiṃ panetesu sabbesu abhiniveso ^a^M2.0395^ea^ jāyatīti? na jāyati. iriyāpathasampajaññanīvaraṇabojjhaṅgesu hi abhiniveso na jāyati, sesesu jāyatīti. ^b^mahāsīvatthero^eb^ panāha ``etesupi abhiniveso jāyati. ayañhi `atthi nu kho me cattāro iriyāpathā udāhu natthi, atthi nu kho me catusampajaññaṃ udāhu ^a^V2.0356^ea^ natthi, atthi nu kho me pañcanīvaraṇā udāhu natthi, atthi nu kho me sattabojjhaṅgā udāhu natthī'ti evaṃ pariggaṇhāti. tasmā sabbattha abhiniveso jāyatī''ti.

[03] ^b^yo hi koci, bhikkhave^eb^ti yo hi koci, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā upāsako vā upāsikā vā. ^b^evaṃ bhāveyyā^eb^tiādito paṭṭhāya vuttena bhāvanānukkamena bhāveyya. ^b^pāṭikaṅkha^eb^nti paṭikaṅkhitabbaṃ icchitabbaṃ avassaṃbhāvīti attho. ^b^aññā^eb^ti arahattaṃ. ^b^sati vā upādisese^eb^ti upādānasese vā sati aparikkhīṇe. ^b^anāgāmitā^eb^ti anāgāmibhāvo.

[03] evaṃ sattannaṃ vassānaṃ vasena sāsanassa niyyānikabhāvaṃ dassetvā puna tato appatarepi kāle dassento ^b^tiṭṭhantu, bhikkhave^eb^tiādimāha. sabbampi cetaṃ majjhimassa veneyyapuggalassa vasena vuttaṃ, tikkhapaññaṃ pana sandhāya ``pātova anusiṭṭho sāyaṃ visesaṃ adhigamissati, sāyaṃ ^a^P3.0806^ea^ anusiṭṭho pāto visesaṃ adhigamissatī''ti vuttaṃ. iti bhagavā ``evaṃ niyyānikaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāsana''nti dassetvā ekavīsatiyāpi ṭhānesu arahattanikūṭena desitaṃ desanaṃ niyyātento ``ekāyano ayaṃ, bhikkhave, maggo...pe0... iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ, idametaṃ paṭicca vutta''nti āha. sesaṃ uttānatthamevāti. desanāpariyosāne pana tiṃsa bhikkhusahassāni arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsūti.
[06] iti sumaṅgalavilāsiniyā dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
[06] mahāsatipaṭṭhānasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 406^b^.^eb^ ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0357^ea^ ^a^P3.0807^ea^ ^a^M2.0396^ea^ ^b^me suta^eb^nti pāyāsirājaññasuttaṃ. tatrāyamapubbapadavaṇṇanā -- ^b^āyasmā^eb^ti piyavacanametaṃ. ^b^kumārakassapo^eb^ti tassa nāmaṃ. kumārakāle pabbajitattā pana bhagavatā ``kassapaṃ pakkosatha, idaṃ phalaṃ vā khādanīyaṃ vā kassapassa dethā''ti vutte ``katarakassapassā''ti. ``kumārakassapassā''ti evaṃ gahitanāmattā tato paṭṭhāya vuḍḍhakālepi ``kumārakassapo'' tveva vuccati. apica rañño posāvanikaputtattāpi taṃ kumārakassapoti sañjāniṃsu.

[03] ayaṃ panassa pubbayogato paṭṭhāya āvibhāvakathā -- thero kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle seṭṭhiputto ahosi. athekadivasaṃ bhagavantaṃ citrakathiṃ ekaṃ attano sāvakaṃ etadagge ṭhapentaṃ disvā bhagavato sattāhaṃ dānaṃ datvā ``ahampi bhagavā anāgate ekassa buddhassa ayaṃ thero viya citrakathī sāvako bhavāmī''ti patthanaṃ katvā puññāni karonto kassapassa bhagavato sāsane pabbajitvā visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ nāsakkhi. tadā kira parinibbutassa bhagavato sāsane osakkante pañca bhikkhū nisseṇiṃ bandhitvā pabbataṃ āruyha samaṇadhammaṃ akaṃsu. saṅghatthero tatiyadivase arahattaṃ patto, anuthero catutthadivase anāgāmī ahosi, itare tayo visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ asakkontā devaloke nibbattā.

[03] tesaṃ ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devesu ca manussesu ca sampattiṃ anubhavantānaṃ eko takkasilāyaṃ rājakule nibbattitvā pakkusāti nāma rājā hutvā bhagavantaṃ uddissa pabbajitvā rājagahaṃ uddissa āgacchanto kumbhakārasālāyaṃ bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ sutvā anāgāmiphalaṃ patto. eko ^a^P3.0808^ea^ ekasmiṃ samuddapaṭṭane kulaghare nibbattitvā nāvaṃ āruyha bhinnanāvo dārucīrāni nivāsetvā lābhasampattiṃ patto ``ahaṃ arahā''ti cittaṃ uppādetvā ``na tvaṃ arahā, gaccha, satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchā''ti atthakāmāya devatāya codito tathā katvā arahattaphalaṃ patto.

[03] eko ^a^V2.0358^ea^ rājagahe ekissā kuladārikāya kucchimhi uppanno. sā ca paṭhamaṃ mātāpitaro yācitvā pabbajjaṃ alabhamānā kulagharaṃ gantvā gabbhaṃ gaṇhi ^a^M2.0397^ea^. gabbhasaṇṭhitampi ajānanti sāmikaṃ ārādhetvā tena anuññātā bhikkhunīsu pabbajitā, tassā gabbhanimittaṃ disvā bhikkhuniyo devadattaṃ pucchiṃsu. so ``assamaṇī''ti āha. dasabalaṃ pucchiṃsu. satthā upālittheraṃ sampaṭicchāpesi. thero sāvatthinagaravāsīni kulāni visākhañca upāsikaṃ pakkosāpetvā sodhento ``pure laddho gabbho, pabbajjā arogā''ti āha. satthā ``suvinicchitaṃ adhikaraṇa''nti therassa sādhukāramadāsi. sā bhikkhunī suvaṇṇabimbasadisaṃ puttaṃ vijāyi. taṃ gahetvā rājā pasenadi kosalo posāpesi. ``kassapo''ti cassa nāmaṃ katvā aparabhāge alaṅkaritvā satthu santikaṃ netvā pabbājesi. iti naṃ rañño posāvanikaputtattāpi ``kumārakassapo''ti sañjāniṃsūti. taṃ ekadivasaṃ andhavane samaṇadhammaṃ karontaṃ atthakāmā devatā pañhe uggahāpetvā ``ime pañhe bhagavantaṃ pucchā''ti āha. thero pañhe pucchitvā pañhavissajjanāvasāne arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. bhagavāpi taṃ citrakathikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.

[03] ^b^setabyā^eb^ti tassa nagarassa nāmaṃ. ^b^uttarena setabya^eb^nti setabyato uttaradisāya. ^b^rājañño^eb^ti anabhisittakarājā. ^b^diṭṭhigata^eb^nti diṭṭhiyeva. yathā gūthagataṃ muttagatanti vutte na gūthādito aññaṃ atthi, evaṃ diṭṭhiyeva diṭṭhigataṃ. ^b^itipi natthī^eb^ti taṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ apadisitvā evampi natthīti vadati. ^b^purā...pe0... saññāpetī^eb^ti yāva na saññāpeti.

[03] 411^b^.^eb^ ^b^ime bho, kassapa, candimasūriyā^eb^ti so kira therena pucchito cintesi ``ayaṃ samaṇo paṭhamaṃ candimasūriye upamaṃ āhari, candimasūriyasadiso bhavissati paññāya, anabhibhavanīyo ^a^P3.0809^ea^ aññena, sace panāhaṃ `candimasūriyā imasmiṃ loke'ti bhaṇissāmi, `kiṃ nissitā ete, kittakapamāṇā, kittakaṃ uccā'tiādīhi paliveṭhessati. ahaṃ kho panetaṃ nibbeṭhetuṃ na sakkhissāmi, `parasmiṃ loke' iccevassa kathessāmī''ti. tasmā evamāha.

[03] bhagavā ^a^M2.0398^ea^ pana tato pubbe na cirasseva ^b^sudhābhojanīyajātakaṃ^eb^ kathesi. tattha ``cande cando devaputto, sūriye sūriyo devaputto''ti āgataṃ. bhagavatā ca kathitaṃ jātakaṃ vā suttantaṃ vā sakalajambudīpe ^a^V2.0359^ea^ patthaṭaṃ hoti, tena so ``ettha nivāsino devaputtā natthī''ti na sakkā vattunti cintetvā ^b^devā te na manussā^eb^ti āha.

[03] 412^b^.^eb^ ^b^atthi pana, rājañña, pariyāyo^eb^ti atthi pana kāraṇanti pucchati. ^b^ābādhikā^eb^ti visabhāgavedanāsaṅkhātena ābādhena samannāgatā. ^b^dukkhitā^eb^ti dukkhappattā. ^b^bāḷhagilānā^eb^ti adhimattagilānā. ^b^saddhāyikā^eb^ti ahaṃ tumhe saddahāmi, tumhe mayhaṃ saddhāyikā saddhāyitabbavacanāti attho. ^b^paccayikā^eb^ti ahaṃ tumhe pattiyāmi, tumhe mayhaṃ paccayikā pattiyāyitabbāti attho.

[03] 413^b^.^eb^ ^b^uddisitvā^eb^ti tesaṃ attānañca paṭisāmitabhaṇḍakañca dassetvā, sampaṭicchāpetvāti attho. ^b^vippalapantassā^eb^ti ``putto me, dhītā me, dhanaṃ me''ti vividhaṃ palapantassa. ^b^nirayapālesū^eb^ti niraye kammakāraṇikasattesu. ye pana ``kammameva kammakāraṇaṃ karoti, natthi nirayapālā''ti vadanti. te ``tamenaṃ, bhikkhave, nirayapālā''ti devadūtasuttaṃ paṭibāhanti. manussaloke rājakulesu kāraṇikamanussā viya hi niraye nirayapālā honti.
[03] 415^b^.^eb^ ^b^veḷupesikāhī^eb^ti veḷuvilīvehi. ^b^sunimmajjathā^eb^ti yathā suṭṭhu nimmajjitaṃ hoti, evaṃ nimmajjatha, apanethāti attho.

[03] ^b^asucī^eb^ti amanāpo. ^b^asucisaṅkhāto^eb^ti asucikoṭṭhāsabhūto asucīti ñāto vā. ^b^duggandho^eb^ti ^a^P3.0810^ea^ kuṇapagandho. ^b^jeguccho^eb^ti jigucchitabbayutto. ^b^paṭikūlo^eb^ti dassaneneva paṭighāvaho. ^b^ubbādhatī^eb^ti divasassa dvikkhattuṃ nhatvā tikkhattuṃ vatthāni parivattetvā alaṅkatapaṭimaṇḍitānaṃ cakkavattiādīnampi manussānaṃ gandho yojanasate ṭhitānaṃ devatānaṃ kaṇṭhe āsattakuṇapaṃ viya bādhati.
[03] 416^b^.^eb^ puna ^a^M2.0399^ea^ pāṇātipātādipañcasīlāni samādāyavattentānaṃ vasena vadati. ^b^tāvatiṃsāna^eb^nti idañca dūre nibbattā tāva mā āgacchantu, ime kasmā na entīti vadati.

[03] 418^b^.^eb^ ^b^jaccandhūpamo^eb^ ^a^V2.0360^ea^ ^b^maññe paṭibhāsī^eb^ti jaccandho viya upaṭṭhāsi. ^b^araññavanapatthānī^eb^ti araññakaṅgayuttatāya araññāni, mahāvanasaṇḍatāya vanapatthāni. ^b^pantānī^eb^ti dūrāni.
[03] 419^b^.^eb^ ^b^kalyāṇadhamme^eb^ti teneva sīlena sundaradhamme. ^b^dukkhapaṭikūle^eb^ti dukkhaṃ apatthente. ^b^seyyo bhavissatī^eb^ti paraloke sugatisukhaṃ bhavissatīti adhippāyo.

[03] 420^b^.^eb^ ^b^upavijaññā^eb^ti upagatavijāyanakālā, paripakkagabbhā na cirasseva vijāyissatīti attho. ^b^opabhoggā bhavissatī^eb^ti pādaparicārikā bhavissati. ^b^anayabyasana^eb^nti mahādukkhaṃ. ayoti sukhaṃ, na ayo anayo, dukkhaṃ. tadetaṃ sabbaso sukhaṃ byasati vikkhipatīti byasanaṃ. iti anayova byasanaṃ ^b^anayabyasanaṃ,^eb^ mahādukkhanti attho. ^b^ayoniso^eb^ti anupāyena. ^b^apakkaṃ na paripācentī^eb^ti apariṇataṃ akhīṇaṃ āyuṃ antarāva na upacchindanti. ^b^paripākaṃ āgamentī^eb^ti āyuparipākakālaṃ āgamenti. dhammasenāpatināpetaṃ vuttaṃ --
[21] ``nābhinandāmi maraṇaṃ, nābhinandāmi jīvitaṃ.
[22] kālañca paṭikaṅkhāmi, nibbisaṃ bhatako yathāti.. (theragā0 1001)
[03] 421^b^.^eb^ ^b^ubbhinditvā^eb^ti mattikālepaṃ bhinditvā.

[03] 422^b^.^eb^ ^b^rāmaṇeyyaka^eb^nti ^a^P3.0811^ea^ ramaṇīyabhāvaṃ. ^b^velāsikā^eb^ti khiḍḍāparādhikā. ^b^komārikā^eb^ti taruṇadārikā. ^b^tuyhaṃ jīva^eb^nti supinadassanakāle nikkhamantaṃ vā pavisantaṃ vā jīvaṃ api nu passanti. idha cittācāraṃ ``jīva''nti gahetvā āha. so hi tattha jīvasaññīti.

[03] 423^b^.^eb^ ^b^jiyāyā^eb^ti dhanujiyāya, gīvaṃ veṭhetvāti attho. ^b^patthinnataro^eb^ti thaddhataro. iminā kiṃ dasseti? tumhe jīvakāle sattassa pañcakkhandhāti ^a^M2.0400^ea^ vadanti, cavanakāle pana rūpakkhandhamattameva avasissati, tayo khandhā appavattā honti, viññāṇakkhandho gacchati. avasiṭṭhena rūpakkhandhena lahutarena bhavitabbaṃ, garukataro ca hoti. tasmā natthi koci kuhiṃ gantāti imamatthaṃ dasseti.
[03] 424^b^.^eb^ ^b^nibbuta^eb^nti vūpasantatejaṃ.

[03] 425^b^.^eb^ ^b^anupahaccā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0361^ea^ avināsetvā. ^b^āmato hotī^eb^ti addhamato marituṃ āraddho hoti. ^b^odhunāthā^eb^ti orato karotha. ^b^sandhunāthā^eb^ti parato karotha. ^b^niddhunāthā^eb^ti aparāparaṃ karotha. ^b^tañcāyatanaṃ na paṭisaṃvedetī^eb^ti tena cakkhunā taṃ rūpāyatanaṃ na vibhāveti. esa nayo sabbattha.
[03] 426^b^.^eb^ ^b^saṅkhadhamo^eb^ti saṅkhadhamako. ^b^upalāpetvā^eb^ti dhamitvā.

[03] 428^b^.^eb^ ^b^aggiko^eb^ti aggiparicārako. ^b^āpādeyya^eb^nti nipphādeyyaṃ, āyuṃ vā pāpuṇāpeyyaṃ. ^b^poseyya^eb^nti bhojanādīhi bhareyyaṃ. ^b^vaḍḍheyya^eb^nti vaḍḍhiṃ gameyyaṃ. ^b^araṇīsahita^eb^nti araṇīyugaḷaṃ.

[03] 429^b^.^eb^ ^b^tirorājānopī^eb^ti tiroraṭṭhe aññasmimpi janapade rājāno jānanti. ^b^abyatto^eb^ti avisado acheko. ^b^kopenapī^eb^ti ye maṃ evaṃ vakkhanti, tesu uppajjanakena kopenapi etaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ harissāmi pariharissāmīti gahetvā vicarissāmi. ^b^makkhenā^eb^ti tayā vuttayuttakāraṇamakkhalakkhaṇena makkhenāpi. ^b^palāsenā^eb^ti tayā saddhiṃ yugaggāhalakkhaṇena palāsenāpi.

[03] 430^b^.^eb^ ^b^haritakapaṇṇa^eb^nti ^a^P3.0812^ea^ yaṃ kiñci haritakaṃ, antamaso allatiṇapaṇṇampi na hotīti attho. ^b^sannaddhakalāpa^eb^nti sannaddhadhanukalāpaṃ. ^b^āsittodakāni vaṭumānī^eb^ti paripuṇṇasalilā maggā ca kandarā ca. ^b^yoggānī^eb^ti balibadde.
[03] bahunikkhantaroti ^b^bahunikkhanto^eb^ ciranikkhantoti attho. ^b^yathābhatena bhaṇḍenā^eb^ti yaṃ vo tiṇakaṭṭhodakabhaṇḍakaṃ āropitaṃ, tena yathābhatena yathāropitena, yathāgahitenāti attho.
[03] ^b^appasārānī^eb^ti appagghāni. ^b^paṇiyānī^eb^ti bhaṇḍāni.

[03] 432^b^.^eb^ ^b^mama^eb^ ^a^M2.0401^ea^ ^b^ca sūkarabhatta^eb^nti mama ca sūkarānaṃ idaṃ bhattaṃ. ^b^uggharanta^eb^nti upari gharantaṃ. ^b^paggharanta^eb^nti ^a^V2.0362^ea^ heṭṭhā parissavantaṃ. ^b^tumhe khvettha bhaṇe^eb^ti tumhe kho ettha bhaṇe. ayameva vā pāṭho. ^b^tathā hi pana me sūkarabhatta^eb^nti tathā hi pana me ayaṃ gūtho sūkarānaṃ bhattaṃ.

[03] 434^b^.^eb^ ^b^āgatāgataṃ kaliṃ gilatī^eb^ti āgatāgataṃ parājayaguḷaṃ gilati. ^b^pajjohissāmī^eb^ti pajjohanaṃ karissāmi, balikammaṃ karissāmīti attho. ^b^akkhehi dibbissāmā^eb^ti guḷehi kīḷissāma. ^b^littaṃ paramena tejasā^eb^ti paramatejena visena littaṃ.

[03] 436^b^.^eb^ ^b^gāmapaṭṭa^eb^nti vuṭṭhitagāmapadeso vuccati. ``gāmapada''ntipi pāṭho, ayamevattho. ^b^sāṇabhāra^eb^nti sāṇavākabhāraṃ. ^b^susannaddho^eb^ti subaddho. ^b^tvaṃ pajānāhī^eb^ti tvaṃ jāna. sace gaṇhitukāmosi, gaṇhāhīti vuttaṃ hoti.
[03] ^b^khoma^eb^nti khomavākaṃ. ^b^aya^eb^nti kāḷalohaṃ. ^b^loha^eb^nti tambalohaṃ. ^b^sajjha^eb^nti rajataṃ. ^b^suvaṇṇa^eb^nti ^a^P3.0813^ea^ suvaṇṇamāsakaṃ. ^b^abhinandiṃsū^eb^ti tussiṃsu.

[03] 437^b^.^eb^ ^b^attamano^eb^ti sakamano tuṭṭhacitto. ^b^abhiraddho^eb^ti abhippasanno. ^b^pañhāpaṭibhānānī^eb^ti pañhupaṭṭhānāni. ^b^paccanīkaṃ kattabba^eb^nti paccanīkaṃ paṭiviruddhaṃ viya kattabbaṃ amaññissaṃ, paṭilomagāhaṃ gahetvā aṭṭhāsinti attho.

[03] 438^b^.^eb^ ^b^saṅghātaṃ āpajjantī^eb^ti saṅghātaṃ vināsaṃ maraṇaṃ āpajjanti. ^b^na mahapphalo^eb^ti vipākaphalena na mahapphalo hoti. ^b^na mahānisaṃso^eb^ti guṇānisaṃsena mahānisaṃso na hoti. ^b^na mahājutiko^eb^ti ānubhāvajutiyā mahājutiko na hoti. ^b^na mahāvipphāro^eb^ti vipākavipphāratāya mahāvipphāro na hoti. ^b^bījanaṅgala^eb^nti bījañca naṅgalañca. ^b^dukkhette^eb^ti duṭṭhukhette nissārakhette. ^b^dubbhūme^eb^ti visamabhūmibhāge. ^b^patiṭṭhāpeyyā^eb^ti ṭhapeyya. ^b^khaṇḍānī^eb^ti chinnabhinnāni. ^b^pūtīnī^eb^ti nissārāni. ^b^vātātapahatānī^eb^ti ^a^M2.0402^ea^ vātena ca ātapena ca hatāni pariyādinnatejāni. ^b^asārādānī^eb^ti taṇḍulasārādānarahitāni palālāni. ^b^asukhasayitānī^eb^ti yāni sukkhāpetvā koṭṭhe ākiritvā ṭhapitāni, tāni sukhasayitāni nāma. etāni pana na tādisāni. ^b^anuppaveccheyyā^eb^ti anupaveseyya, na sammā vasseyya, anvaddhamāsaṃ anudasāhaṃ anupañcāhaṃ na vasseyyāti attho. ^b^api nu tānī^eb^ti api nu evaṃ khettabījavuṭṭhidose sati tāni bījāni aṅkuramūlapattādīhi uddhaṃ vuddhiṃ heṭṭhā virūḷhiṃ samantato ca vepullaṃ āpajjeyyunti ^a^V2.0363^ea^. ^b^evarūpo kho rājañña yañño^eb^ti evarūpaṃ rājañña dānaṃ parūpaghātena uppāditapaccayatopi dāyakatopi pariggāhakatopi avisuddhattā na mahapphalaṃ hoti.

[03] ^b^evarūpo kho rājañña yañño^eb^ti evarūpaṃ rājaññadānaṃ aparūpaghātena uppannapaccayatopi aparūpaghātitāya sīlavantadāyakatopi ^a^P3.0814^ea^ sammādiṭṭhiādiguṇasampannapaṭiggāhakatopi mahapphalaṃ hoti. sace pana guṇātirekaṃ nirodhā vuṭṭhitaṃ paṭiggāhakaṃ labhati, cetanā ca vipulā hoti, diṭṭheva dhamme vipākaṃ detīti.

[03] 439^b^.^eb^ imaṃ pana therassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā pāyāsirājañño theraṃ nimantetvā sattāhaṃ therassa mahādānaṃ datvā tato paṭṭhāya mahājanassa dānaṃ paṭṭhapesi. taṃ sandhāya ^b^atha kho pāyāsi rājañño^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^kaṇājaka^eb^nti sakuṇḍakaṃ uttaṇḍulabhattaṃ. ^b^bilaṅgadutiya^eb^nti kañjikadutiyaṃ. ^b^dhorakāni ca vatthānī^eb^ti thūlāni ca vatthāni. ^b^guḷavālakānī^eb^ti guḷadasāni, puñjapuñjavasena ṭhitamahantadasānīti attho. ^b^evaṃ anuddisatī^eb^ti evaṃ upadisati. ^b^pādāpī^eb^ti pādenapi.

[03] 440^b^.^eb^ ^b^asakkacca^eb^nti saddhāvirahitaṃ assaddhadānaṃ. ^b^asahatthā^eb^ti na sahatthena. ^b^acittīkata^eb^nti cittīkāravirahitaṃ, na cittīkārampi paccupaṭṭhāpetvā na paṇītacittaṃ katvā adāsi. ^b^apaviddha^eb^nti chaḍḍitaṃ vippatitaṃ. ^b^suññaṃ serīsaka^eb^nti serīsakaṃ nāma ekaṃ tucchaṃ rajatavimānaṃ upagato. tassa kira dvāre mahāsirīsarukkho, tena taṃ ``serīsaka''nti vuccati.

[03] 441^b^.^eb^ ^b^āyasmā^eb^ ^a^M2.0403^ea^ ^b^gavaṃpatī^eb^ti thero kira pubbe manussakāle gopāladārakānaṃ jeṭṭhako hutvā mahato sirīsassa mūlaṃ sodhetvā vālikaṃ okiritvā ekaṃ piṇḍapātikattheraṃ rukkhamūle nisīdāpetvā attanā laddhaṃ āhāraṃ datvā tato cuto tassānubhāvena tasmiṃ rajatavimāne nibbatti. sirīsarukkho vimānadvāre aṭṭhāsi. so paññāsāya vassehi phalati, tato paññāsa vassāni gatānīti devaputto saṃvegaṃ āpajjati. so aparena samayena amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle manussesu nibbattitvā satthu dhammakathaṃ sutvā arahattaṃ patto. pubbāciṇṇavasena pana divāvihāratthāya tadeva vimānaṃ abhiṇhaṃ gacchati, taṃ kirassa utusukhaṃ hoti. taṃ sandhāya ``tena kho pana samayena āyasmā gavaṃpatī''tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^so^eb^ ^a^P3.0815^ea^ ^a^V2.0364^ea^ ^b^sakkaccaṃ dānaṃ datvā^eb^ti so parassa santakampi dānaṃ sakkaccaṃ datvā. ^b^evamārocesī^eb^ti ``sakkaccaṃ dānaṃ dethā''tiādinā nayena ārocesi. tañca pana therassa ārocanaṃ sutvā mahājano sakkaccaṃ dānaṃ datvā devaloke nibbatto. pāyāsissa pana rājaññassa paricārakā sakkaccaṃ dānaṃ datvāpi nikantivasena gantvā tasseva santike nibbattā. taṃ kira disācārikavimānaṃ vaṭṭaniaṭaviyaṃ ahosi. pāyāsidevaputto ca ekadivasaṃ vāṇijakānaṃ dassetvā attano katakammaṃ kathesīti.
[06] iti sumaṅgalavilāsiniyā dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
[06] pāyāsirājaññasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06] niṭṭhitā ca mahāvaggassatthavaṇṇanā.
[06] mahāvaggaṭṭhakathā niṭṭhitā.
